\u521b\u5efa\u9ad8\u6027\u80fd\u5bf9\u8c61\u6c60\nfunc NewHighPerformancePool(newFunc func() interface{}, resetFunc func(interface{}), maxSize int) *HighPerformancePool {\n return &HighPerformancePool{\n pool: sync.Pool{\n New: newFunc,\n },\n newFunc: newFunc,\n resetFunc: resetFunc,\n maxSize: maxSize,\n stats: &PoolStats{\n MaxSize: maxSize,\n LastReset: time.Now(),\n },\n }\n}\n\n// \u83b7\u53d6\u5bf9\u8c61\nfunc (hpp *HighPerformancePool) Get() interface{} {\n atomic.AddInt64(&hpp.stats.Gets, 1)\n \n obj := hpp.pool.Get()\n if obj != nil {\n atomic.AddInt64(&hpp.stats.Hits, 1)\n atomic.AddInt64(&hpp.currentSize, -1)\n } else {\n atomic.AddInt64(&hpp.stats.Misses, 1)\n obj = hpp.newFunc()\n }\n \n return obj\n}\n\n// \u5f52\u8fd8\u5bf9\u8c61\nfunc (hpp *HighPerformancePool) Put(obj interface{}) {\n if obj == nil {\n return\n }\n \n atomic.AddInt64(&hpp.stats.Puts, 1)\n \n // \u68c0\u67e5\u6c60\u5927\u5c0f\u9650\u5236\n if int(atomic.LoadInt64(&hpp.currentSize)) >= hpp.maxSize {\n return // \u4e22\u5f03\u5bf9\u8c61\uff0c\u907f\u514d\u6c60\u8fc7\u5927\n }\n \n // \u91cd\u7f6e\u5bf9\u8c61\u72b6\u6001\n if hpp.resetFunc != nil {\n hpp.resetFunc(obj)\n }\n \n hpp.pool.Put(obj)\n atomic.AddInt64(&hpp.currentSize, 1)\n}\n\n// \u83b7\u53d6\u6c60\u5927\u5c0f\nfunc (hpp *HighPerformancePool) Size() int {\n return int(atomic.LoadInt64(&hpp.currentSize))\n}\n\n// \u83b7\u53d6\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\nfunc (hpp *HighPerformancePool) Stats() *PoolStats {\n hpp.mutex.RLock()\n defer hpp.mutex.RUnlock()\n \n gets := atomic.LoadInt64(&hpp.stats.Gets)\n hits := atomic.LoadInt64(&hpp.stats.Hits)\n \n stats := *hpp.stats\n stats.Gets = gets\n stats.Puts = atomic.LoadInt64(&hpp.stats.Puts)\n stats.Hits = hits\n stats.Misses = atomic.LoadInt64(&hpp.stats.Misses)\n stats.Size = hpp.Size()\n \n if gets > 0 {\n stats.HitRate = float64(hits) / float64(gets) * 100\n }\n \n return &stats\n}\n\n// \u6e05\u7a7a\u6c60\nfunc (hpp *HighPerformancePool) Clear() {\n // \u521b\u5efa\u65b0\u7684sync.Pool\u6765\u6e05\u7a7a\n hpp.pool = sync.Pool{\n New: hpp.newFunc,\n }\n atomic.StoreInt64(&hpp.currentSize, 0)\n}\n\n// \u5b57\u8282\u7f13\u51b2\u6c60\ntype ByteBufferPool struct {\n pool *HighPerformancePool\n initialSize int\n maxSize int\n}\n\n// \u521b\u5efa\u5b57\u8282\u7f13\u51b2\u6c60\nfunc NewByteBufferPool(initialSize, maxSize int, poolMaxSize int) *ByteBufferPool {\n bbp := &ByteBufferPool{\n initialSize: initialSize,\n maxSize: maxSize,\n }\n \n bbp.pool = NewHighPerformancePool(\n func() interface{} {\n return bytes.NewBuffer(make([]byte, 0, bbp.initialSize))\n },\n func(obj interface{}) {\n if buf, ok := obj.(*bytes.Buffer); ok {\n buf.Reset()\n // \u5982\u679c\u7f13\u51b2\u533a\u592a\u5927\uff0c\u91cd\u65b0\u521b\u5efa\n if buf.Cap() > bbp.maxSize {\n buf = bytes.NewBuffer(make([]byte, 0, bbp.initialSize))\n }\n }\n },\n poolMaxSize,\n )\n \n return bbp\n}\n\n// \u83b7\u53d6\u5b57\u8282\u7f13\u51b2\nfunc (bbp *ByteBufferPool) Get() *bytes.Buffer {\n return bbp.pool.Get().(*bytes.Buffer)\n}\n\n// \u5f52\u8fd8\u5b57\u8282\u7f13\u51b2\nfunc (bbp *ByteBufferPool) Put(buf *bytes.Buffer) {\n bbp.pool.Put(buf)\n}\n\n// HTTP\u54cd\u5e94\u6c60\ntype HTTPResponsePool struct {\n pool *HighPerformancePool\n}\n\n// HTTP\u54cd\u5e94\u5bf9\u8c61\ntype HTTPResponse struct {\n StatusCode int `json:\"status_code\"`\n Headers map[string]string `json:\"headers\"`\n Body []byte `json:\"body\"`\n Timestamp time.Time `json:\"timestamp\"`\n}\n\n// \u521b\u5efaHTTP\u54cd\u5e94\u6c60\nfunc NewHTTPResponsePool(maxSize int) *HTTPResponsePool {\n hrp := &HTTPResponsePool{}\n \n hrp.pool = NewHighPerformancePool(\n func() interface{} {\n return &HTTPResponse{\n Headers: make(map[string]string),\n Body: make([]byte, 0, 1024),\n }\n },\n func(obj interface{}) {\n if resp, ok := obj.(*HTTPResponse); ok {\n resp.StatusCode = 0\n // \u6e05\u7a7aheaders\u4f46\u4fdd\u7559\u5bb9\u91cf\n for k := range resp.Headers {\n delete(resp.Headers, k)\n }\n resp.Body = resp.Body[:0] // \u4fdd\u7559\u5bb9\u91cf\n resp.Timestamp = time.Time{}\n }\n },\n maxSize,\n )\n \n return hrp\n}\n\n// \u83b7\u53d6HTTP\u54cd\u5e94\u5bf9\u8c61\nfunc (hrp *HTTPResponsePool) Get() *HTTPResponse {\n return hrp.pool.Get().(*HTTPResponse)\n}\n\n// \u5f52\u8fd8HTTP\u54cd\u5e94\u5bf9\u8c61\nfunc (hrp *HTTPResponsePool) Put(resp *HTTPResponse) {\n hrp.pool.Put(resp)\n}\n\n// \u8fde\u63a5\u6c60\u7ba1\u7406\u5668\ntype ConnectionPool struct {\n pool chan interface{}\n factory func() (interface{}, error)\n close func(interface{}) error\n ping func(interface{}) error\n maxIdle int\n maxActive int\n idleTimeout time.Duration\n active int64\n stats *PoolStats\n mutex sync.RWMutex\n}\n\n// \u8fde\u63a5\u6c60\u914d\u7f6e\ntype ConnectionPoolConfig struct {\n MaxIdle int `json:\"max_idle\"`\n MaxActive int `json:\"max_active\"`\n IdleTimeout time.Duration `json:\"idle_timeout\"`\n Factory func() (interface{}, error)\n Close func(interface{}) error\n Ping func(interface{}) error\n}\n\n// \u521b\u5efa\u8fde\u63a5\u6c60\nfunc NewConnectionPool(config *ConnectionPoolConfig) *ConnectionPool {\n return &ConnectionPool{\n pool: make(chan interface{}, config.MaxIdle),\n factory: config.Factory,\n close: config.Close,\n ping: config.Ping,\n maxIdle: config.MaxIdle,\n maxActive: config.MaxActive,\n idleTimeout: config.IdleTimeout,\n stats: &PoolStats{\n MaxSize: config.MaxIdle,\n LastReset: time.Now(),\n },\n }\n}\n\n// \u83b7\u53d6\u8fde\u63a5\nfunc (cp *ConnectionPool) Get() (interface{}, error) {\n atomic.AddInt64(&cp.stats.Gets, 1)\n \n // \u5c1d\u8bd5\u4ece\u6c60\u4e2d\u83b7\u53d6\u8fde\u63a5\n select {\n case conn := <-cp.pool:\n // \u68c0\u67e5\u8fde\u63a5\u662f\u5426\u6709\u6548\n if cp.ping != nil && cp.ping(conn) != nil {\n cp.close(conn)\n atomic.AddInt64(&cp.stats.Misses, 1)\n return cp.createConnection()\n }\n atomic.AddInt64(&cp.stats.Hits, 1)\n return conn, nil\n default:\n // \u6c60\u4e2d\u6ca1\u6709\u53ef\u7528\u8fde\u63a5\uff0c\u521b\u5efa\u65b0\u8fde\u63a5\n atomic.AddInt64(&cp.stats.Misses, 1)\n return cp.createConnection()\n }\n}\n\n// \u521b\u5efa\u65b0\u8fde\u63a5\nfunc (cp *ConnectionPool) createConnection() (interface{}, error) {\n // \u68c0\u67e5\u6d3b\u8dc3\u8fde\u63a5\u6570\u9650\u5236\n if int(atomic.LoadInt64(&cp.active)) >= cp.maxActive {\n return nil, fmt.Errorf(\"connection pool exhausted\")\n }\n \n conn, err := cp.factory()\n if err != nil {\n return nil, err\n }\n \n atomic.AddInt64(&cp.active, 1)\n return conn, nil\n}\n\n// \u5f52\u8fd8\u8fde\u63a5\nfunc (cp *ConnectionPool) Put(conn interface{}) {\n if conn == nil {\n return\n }\n \n atomic.AddInt64(&cp.stats.Puts, 1)\n \n // \u5c1d\u8bd5\u5c06\u8fde\u63a5\u653e\u56de\u6c60\u4e2d\n select {\n case cp.pool <- conn:\n // \u6210\u529f\u653e\u56de\u6c60\u4e2d\n default:\n // \u6c60\u5df2\u6ee1\uff0c\u5173\u95ed\u8fde\u63a5\n cp.close(conn)\n atomic.AddInt64(&cp.active, -1)\n }\n}\n\n// \u5173\u95ed\u8fde\u63a5\u6c60\nfunc (cp *ConnectionPool) Close() error {\n close(cp.pool)\n \n // \u5173\u95ed\u6240\u6709\u6c60\u4e2d\u7684\u8fde\u63a5\n for conn := range cp.pool {\n cp.close(conn)\n atomic.AddInt64(&cp.active, -1)\n }\n \n return nil\n}\n\n// \u6c60\u7ba1\u7406\u5668\ntype PoolManager struct {\n pools map[string]ObjectPool\n mutex sync.RWMutex\n}\n\n// \u521b\u5efa\u6c60\u7ba1\u7406\u5668\nfunc NewPoolManager() *PoolManager {\n return &PoolManager{\n pools: make(map[string]ObjectPool),\n }\n}\n\n// \u6ce8\u518c\u6c60\nfunc (pm *PoolManager) RegisterPool(name string, pool ObjectPool) {\n pm.mutex.Lock()\n defer pm.mutex.Unlock()\n pm.pools[name] = pool\n}\n\n// \u83b7\u53d6\u6c60\nfunc (pm *PoolManager) GetPool(name string) ObjectPool {\n pm.mutex.RLock()\n defer pm.mutex.RUnlock()\n return pm.pools[name]\n}\n\n// \u83b7\u53d6\u6240\u6709\u6c60\u7684\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\nfunc (pm *PoolManager) GetAllStats() map[string]*PoolStats {\n pm.mutex.RLock()\n defer pm.mutex.RUnlock()\n \n stats := make(map[string]*PoolStats)\n for name, pool := range pm.pools {\n stats[name] = pool.Stats()\n }\n return stats\n}\n\n// \u6e05\u7a7a\u6240\u6709\u6c60\nfunc (pm *PoolManager) ClearAll() {\n pm.mutex.RLock()\n defer pm.mutex.RUnlock()\n \n for _, pool := range pm.pools {\n pool.Clear()\n }\n}\n```\n\n---\n\n## \u26a1 \u5e76\u53d1\u6027\u80fd\u8c03\u4f18\n\n### Goroutine\u6c60\u4f18\u5316\n\n```go\n// Goroutine\u6c60\u7ba1\u7406\u5668\npackage goroutine\n\nimport (\n \"context\"\n \"fmt\"\n \"runtime\"\n \"sync\"\n \"sync/atomic\"\n \"time\"\n)\n\n// \u5de5\u4f5c\u4efb\u52a1\u63a5\u53e3\ntype Task interface {\n Execute(ctx context.Context) error\n}\n\n// \u51fd\u6570\u4efb\u52a1\ntype FuncTask struct {\n Fn func(ctx context.Context) error\n}\n\nfunc (ft *FuncTask) Execute(ctx context.Context) error {\n return ft.Fn(ctx)\n}\n\n// Goroutine\u6c60\ntype GoroutinePool struct {\n // \u914d\u7f6e\u53c2\u6570\n minWorkers int\n maxWorkers int\n maxIdleTime time.Duration\n taskQueueSize int\n \n // \u8fd0\u884c\u65f6\u72b6\u6001\n workers int64\n activeWorkers int64\n taskQueue chan Task\n workerQueue chan chan Task\n quit chan bool\n wg sync.WaitGroup\n \n // \u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\n stats *PoolStats\n \n // \u63a7\u5236\n mutex sync.RWMutex\n started bool\n}\n\n// \u6c60\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\ntype PoolStats struct {\n Workers int64 `json:\"workers\"`\n ActiveWorkers int64 `json:\"active_workers\"`\n QueuedTasks int `json:\"queued_tasks\"`\n CompletedTasks int64 `json:\"completed_tasks\"`\n FailedTasks int64 `json:\"failed_tasks\"`\n TotalTasks int64 `json:\"total_tasks\"`\n AvgTaskTime time.Duration `json:\"avg_task_time\"`\n LastTaskTime time.Time `json:\"last_task_time\"`\n}\n\n// \u6c60\u914d\u7f6e\ntype PoolConfig struct {\n MinWorkers int `json:\"min_workers\"`\n MaxWorkers int `json:\"max_workers\"`\n MaxIdleTime time.Duration `json:\"max_idle_time\"`\n TaskQueueSize int `json:\"task_queue_size\"`\n}\n\n// \u521b\u5efaGoroutine\u6c60\nfunc NewGoroutinePool(config *PoolConfig) *GoroutinePool {\n if config.MinWorkers <= 0 {\n config.MinWorkers = 1\n }\n if config.MaxWorkers <= 0 {\n config.MaxWorkers = runtime.NumCPU() * 2\n }\n if config.MaxIdleTime <= 0 {\n config.MaxIdleTime = 30 * time.Second\n }\n if config.TaskQueueSize <= 0 {\n config.TaskQueueSize = 1000\n }\n \n return &GoroutinePool{\n minWorkers: config.MinWorkers,\n maxWorkers: config.MaxWorkers,\n maxIdleTime: config.MaxIdleTime,\n taskQueueSize: config.TaskQueueSize,\n taskQueue: make(chan Task, config.TaskQueueSize),\n workerQueue: make(chan chan Task, config.MaxWorkers),\n quit: make(chan bool),\n stats: &PoolStats{},\n }\n}\n\n// \u542f\u52a8\u6c60\nfunc (gp *GoroutinePool) Start() error {\n gp.mutex.Lock()\n defer gp.mutex.Unlock()\n \n if gp.started {\n return fmt.Errorf(\"pool already started\")\n }\n \n // \u542f\u52a8\u6700\u5c0f\u6570\u91cf\u7684worker\n for i := 0; i < gp.minWorkers; i++ {\n gp.startWorker()\n }\n \n // \u542f\u52a8\u8c03\u5ea6\u5668\n go gp.dispatcher()\n \n // \u542f\u52a8\u76d1\u63a7\u5668\n go gp.monitor()\n \n gp.started = true\n return nil\n}\n\n// \u505c\u6b62\u6c60\nfunc (gp *GoroutinePool) Stop() error {\n gp.mutex.Lock()\n defer gp.mutex.Unlock()\n \n if !gp.started {\n return fmt.Errorf(\"pool not started\")\n }\n \n close(gp.quit)\n gp.wg.Wait()\n \n gp.started = false\n return nil\n}\n\n// \u63d0\u4ea4\u4efb\u52a1\nfunc (gp *GoroutinePool) Submit(task Task) error {\n if !gp.started {\n return fmt.Errorf(\"pool not started\")\n }\n \n select {\n case gp.taskQueue <- task:\n atomic.AddInt64(&gp.stats.TotalTasks, 1)\n return nil\n default:\n return fmt.Errorf(\"task queue full\")\n }\n}\n\n// \u63d0\u4ea4\u51fd\u6570\u4efb\u52a1\nfunc (gp *GoroutinePool) SubmitFunc(fn func(ctx context.Context) error) error {\n return gp.Submit(&FuncTask{Fn: fn})\n}\n\n// \u8c03\u5ea6\u5668\nfunc (gp *GoroutinePool) dispatcher() {\n for {\n select {\n case task := <-gp.taskQueue:\n // \u5c1d\u8bd5\u83b7\u53d6\u53ef\u7528worker\n select {\n case workerTaskQueue := <-gp.workerQueue:\n // \u6709\u53ef\u7528worker\uff0c\u5206\u914d\u4efb\u52a1\n workerTaskQueue <- task\n default:\n // \u6ca1\u6709\u53ef\u7528worker\uff0c\u5c1d\u8bd5\u521b\u5efa\u65b0worker\n if atomic.LoadInt64(&gp.workers) < int64(gp.maxWorkers) {\n gp.startWorker()\n // \u91cd\u65b0\u5c1d\u8bd5\u5206\u914d\u4efb\u52a1\n select {\n case workerTaskQueue := <-gp.workerQueue:\n workerTaskQueue <- task\n case <-time.After(100 * time.Millisecond):\n // \u8d85\u65f6\uff0c\u5c06\u4efb\u52a1\u653e\u56de\u961f\u5217\n select {\n case gp.taskQueue <- task:\n default:\n // \u961f\u5217\u6ee1\uff0c\u4e22\u5f03\u4efb\u52a1\n atomic.AddInt64(&gp.stats.FailedTasks, 1)\n }\n }\n } else {\n // \u5df2\u8fbe\u5230\u6700\u5927worker\u6570\uff0c\u7b49\u5f85\u53ef\u7528worker\n select {\n case workerTaskQueue := <-gp.workerQueue:\n workerTaskQueue <- task\n case <-time.After(1 * time.Second):\n // \u8d85\u65f6\uff0c\u5c06\u4efb\u52a1\u653e\u56de\u961f\u5217\n select {\n case gp.taskQueue <- task:\n default:\n atomic.AddInt64(&gp.stats.FailedTasks, 1)\n }\n }\n }\n }\n case <-gp.quit:\n return\n }\n }\n}\n\n// \u542f\u52a8worker\nfunc (gp *GoroutinePool) startWorker() {\n atomic.AddInt64(&gp.workers, 1)\n gp.wg.Add(1)\n \n go func() {\n defer func() {\n atomic.AddInt64(&gp.workers, -1)\n gp.wg.Done()\n }()\n \n taskQueue := make(chan Task)\n idleTimer := time.NewTimer(gp.maxIdleTime)\n \n for {\n // \u5c06worker\u6ce8\u518c\u5230worker\u961f\u5217\n select {\n case gp.workerQueue <- taskQueue:\n case <-gp.quit:\n return\n }\n \n // \u7b49\u5f85\u4efb\u52a1\u6216\u8d85\u65f6\n select {\n case task := <-taskQueue:\n // \u91cd\u7f6e\u7a7a\u95f2\u8ba1\u65f6\u5668\n if !idleTimer.Stop() {\n <-idleTimer.C\n }\n idleTimer.Reset(gp.maxIdleTime)\n \n // \u6267\u884c\u4efb\u52a1\n gp.executeTask(task)\n \n case <-idleTimer.C:\n // \u7a7a\u95f2\u8d85\u65f6\uff0c\u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u53ef\u4ee5\u9000\u51fa\n if atomic.LoadInt64(&gp.workers) > int64(gp.minWorkers) {\n return\n }\n idleTimer.Reset(gp.maxIdleTime)\n \n case <-gp.quit:\n return\n }\n }\n }()\n}\n\n// \u6267\u884c\u4efb\u52a1\nfunc (gp *GoroutinePool) executeTask(task Task) {\n start := time.Now()\n atomic.AddInt64(&gp.activeWorkers, 1)\n \n defer func() {\n atomic.AddInt64(&gp.activeWorkers, -1)\n duration := time.Since(start)\n \n // \u66f4\u65b0\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\n atomic.AddInt64(&gp.stats.CompletedTasks, 1)\n gp.stats.LastTaskTime = time.Now()\n \n // \u8ba1\u7b97\u5e73\u5747\u4efb\u52a1\u65f6\u95f4\n completed := atomic.LoadInt64(&gp.stats.CompletedTasks)\n if completed > 0 {\n gp.stats.AvgTaskTime = time.Duration(int64(gp.stats.AvgTaskTime)*completed + int64(duration)) / time.Duration(completed+1)\n }\n \n // \u6062\u590dpanic\n if r := recover(); r != nil {\n atomic.AddInt64(&gp.stats.FailedTasks, 1)\n fmt.Printf(\"Task panic recovered: %v\\n\", r)\n }\n }()\n \n // \u6267\u884c\u4efb\u52a1\n ctx := context.Background()\n if err := task.Execute(ctx); err != nil {\n atomic.AddInt64(&gp.stats.FailedTasks, 1)\n fmt.Printf(\"Task execution failed: %v\\n\", err)\n }\n}\n\n// \u76d1\u63a7\u5668\nfunc (gp *GoroutinePool) monitor() {\n ticker := time.NewTicker(10 * time.Second)\n defer ticker.Stop()\n \n for {\n select {\n case <-ticker.C:\n gp.updateStats()\n gp.adjustWorkers()\n case <-gp.quit:\n return\n }\n }\n}\n\n// \u66f4\u65b0\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\nfunc (gp *GoroutinePool) updateStats() {\n gp.stats.Workers = atomic.LoadInt64(&gp.workers)\n gp.stats.ActiveWorkers = atomic.LoadInt64(&gp.activeWorkers)\n gp.stats.QueuedTasks = len(gp.taskQueue)\n}\n\n// \u52a8\u6001\u8c03\u6574worker\u6570\u91cf\nfunc (gp *GoroutinePool) adjustWorkers() {\n queuedTasks := len(gp.taskQueue)\n workers := atomic.LoadInt64(&gp.workers)\n activeWorkers := atomic.LoadInt64(&gp.activeWorkers)\n \n // \u5982\u679c\u961f\u5217\u4e2d\u6709\u5f88\u591a\u4efb\u52a1\u4e14\u6d3b\u8dc3worker\u6bd4\u4f8b\u9ad8\uff0c\u589e\u52a0worker\n if queuedTasks > gp.taskQueueSize/2 && float64(activeWorkers)/float64(workers) > 0.8 {\n if workers < int64(gp.maxWorkers) {\n gp.startWorker()\n fmt.Printf(\"Increased workers to %d due to high load\\n\", workers+1)\n }\n }\n \n // \u5982\u679c\u961f\u5217\u7a7a\u4e14\u6d3b\u8dc3worker\u6bd4\u4f8b\u4f4e\uff0c\u53ef\u80fd\u9700\u8981\u51cf\u5c11worker\uff08\u7531\u7a7a\u95f2\u8d85\u65f6\u5904\u7406\uff09\n}\n\n// \u83b7\u53d6\u7edf\u8ba1\u4fe1\u606f\nfunc (gp *GoroutinePool) Stats() *PoolStats {\n gp.updateStats()\n return gp.stats\n}\n\n// \u83b7\u53d6\u6c60\u72b6\u6001\nfunc (gp *GoroutinePool) Status() map[string]interface{} {\n stats := gp.Stats()\n return map[string]interface{}{\n \"workers\": stats.Workers,\n \"active_workers\": stats.ActiveWorkers,\n \"queued_tasks\": stats.QueuedTasks,\n ## 具体要求：

### 文档结构设计
- 在`goProject/mall-frontend/trial/`目录下创建学习文档
- 采用与Go文档相同的5个篇章结构：
 - `01-basics/` - 基础篇：TypeScript语法基础
 - `02-advanced/` - 进阶篇：React核心概念与Hooks
 - `03-practical/` - 实战篇：Next.js框架应用
 - `04-architecture/` - 架构篇：前端架构设计与状态管理
 - `05-advanced/` - 高级篇：性能优化与生产部署
- 每个篇章包含4个章节，总计20章

### 内容要求
- **每章5000+字**的详细内容，包含大量代码示例
- **引用mall-frontend项目的实际代码**作为学习案例
- 提供与**Java/Python开发者友好的对比**，帮助后端开发者理解前端概念
- 每章包含**面试常考知识点**和**实战练习题**
- 结合mall-frontend项目的**电商业务场景**进行实例讲解

### 写作风格
- 保持**轻松活泼**的语调，使用适量的**emoji表情**增强可读性
- 采用**循序渐进**的教学方式，从基础到高级逐步深入
- 使用**中文**作为主要语言，专业术语保留英文原文
- 每章开头提供**学习目标**，结尾提供**总结回顾**

### 技术覆盖范围
- **TypeScript**: 类型系统、泛型、装饰器、模块系统
- **React**: 组件设计、Hooks、状态管理、生命周期
- **Next.js**: SSR/SSG、路由系统、API Routes、性能优化
- **前端工程化**: Webpack、ESLint、测试、部署流程
- **实际项目集成**: 结合mall-frontend的认证、购物车、支付等功能模块

### 任务管理
- 使用task list工具创建详细的任务清单
- 逐章完成，每完成一章更新任务状态
- 最终提供完整的学习路径总结

3. **提交更改**：

 - 基础篇：Go语法基础、数据类型、控制结构、函数包管理 (4章)
 - 进阶篇：结构体接口、错误处理、并发编程、设计模式 (4章)

\u7ec4\u4ef6\u8bbe\u8ba1\u7684\u6700\u4f73\u5b9e\u8df5\u5206\u6790\n\n\u4eceProductCard\u7ec4\u4ef6\u4e2d\uff0c\u6211\u4eec\u53ef\u4ee5\u5b66\u5230\u4ee5\u4e0b\u6700\u4f73\u5b9e\u8df5\uff1a\n\n#### 1. \u5b8c\u5584\u7684Props\u7c7b\u578b\u5b9a\u4e49\n\n```typescript\n// \u826f\u597d\u7684Props\u8bbe\u8ba1\u539f\u5219\ninterface ComponentProps {\n // \u5fc5\u9700\u7684\u6838\u5fc3\u6570\u636e\n product: Product;\n \n // \u53ef\u9009\u7684\u884c\u4e3a\u63a7\u5236\n loading?: boolean;\n showActions?: boolean;\n showBadge?: boolean | string; // \u652f\u6301\u5e03\u5c14\u503c\u548c\u81ea\u5b9a\u4e49\u6587\u672c\n \n // \u6837\u5f0f\u548c\u5c3a\u5bf8\u63a7\u5236\n size?: 'small' | 'default' | 'large';\n className?: string;\n style?: React.CSSProperties;\n \n // \u4e8b\u4ef6\u56de\u8c03\u51fd\u6570\n onAddToCart?: (product: Product) => void;\n onToggleFavorite?: (product: Product) => void;\n onShare?: (product: Product) => void;\n onViewDetail?: (productId: number) => void;\n}\n```\n\n#### 2. \u72b6\u6001\u7ba1\u7406\u7684\u6700\u4f73\u5b9e\u8df5\n\n```typescript\n// \u7ec4\u4ef6\u5185\u90e8\u72b6\u6001\u7ba1\u7406\nconst ProductCard: FC<ProductCardProps> = (props) => {\n // UI\u72b6\u6001\n const [imageLoading, setImageLoading] = useState(true);\n const [imageError, setImageError] = useState(false);\n \n // \u4ea4\u4e92\u72b6\u6001\n const [isFavorited, setIsFavorited] = useState(false);\n const [addingToCart, setAddingToCart] = useState(false);\n \n // \u4f7f\u7528useCallback\u4f18\u5316\u4e8b\u4ef6\u5904\u7406\u51fd\u6570\n const handleAddToCart = useCallback(async (e: React.MouseEvent) => {\n e.stopPropagation(); // \u9632\u6b62\u4e8b\u4ef6\u5192\u6ce1\n \n if (!onAddToCart) return;\n \n try {\n setAddingToCart(true);\n await onAddToCart(product);\n // \u6210\u529f\u53cd\u9988\n message.success('\u5df2\u6dfb\u52a0\u5230\u8d2d\u7269\u8f66');\n } catch (error) {\n // \u9519\u8bef\u5904\u7406\n message.error('\u6dfb\u52a0\u5931\u8d25\uff0c\u8bf7\u91cd\u8bd5');\n } finally {\n // \u72b6\u6001\u91cd\u7f6e\n setAddingToCart(false);\n }\n }, [onAddToCart, product]);\n \n // \u5176\u4ed6\u4e8b\u4ef6\u5904\u7406\u51fd\u6570...\n};\n```\n\n#### 3. \u54cd\u5e94\u5f0f\u8bbe\u8ba1\u548c\u5c3a\u5bf8\u9002\u914d\n\n```typescript\n// \u54cd\u5e94\u5f0f\u5c3a\u5bf8\u914d\u7f6e\nconst getSizeConfig = () => {\n switch (size) {\n case 'small':\n return {\n cardStyle: { width: 200 },\n imageHeight: 150,\n titleLevel: 5 as const,\n showDescription: false,\n };\n case 'large':\n return {\n cardStyle: { width: 320 },\n imageHeight: 240,\n titleLevel: 4 as const,\n showDescription: true,\n };\n default:\n return {\n cardStyle: { width: 260 },\n imageHeight: 200,\n titleLevel: 5 as const,\n showDescription: true,\n };\n }\n};\n\n// \u4f7f\u7528\u914d\u7f6e\nconst sizeConfig = getSizeConfig();\n```\n\n#### 4. \u6761\u4ef6\u6e32\u67d3\u548c\u52a8\u6001\u5185\u5bb9\n\n```typescript\n// \u667a\u80fd\u6807\u7b7e\u663e\u793a\nconst getStatusBadge = () => {\n if (!showBadge) return null;\n\n // \u81ea\u5b9a\u4e49\u6807\u7b7e\n if (typeof showBadge === 'string') {\n return (\n <Badge.Ribbon text={showBadge} color={badgeColor || 'blue'}>\n <div />\n </Badge.Ribbon>\n );\n }\n\n // \u52a8\u6001\u6807\u7b7e\u903b\u8f91\n const badges = [];\n\n // \u70ed\u9500\u6807\u7b7e\n if (product.sales_count && product.sales_count > 1000) {\n badges.push(\n <Badge.Ribbon key=\"hot\" text=\"\u70ed\u9500\" color=\"red\">\n <div />\n </Badge.Ribbon>\n );\n }\n\n // \u65b0\u54c1\u6807\u7b7e\n const isNew = product.created_at && \n new Date(product.created_at).getTime() > Date.now() - 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000;\n if (isNew) {\n badges.push(\n <Badge.Ribbon key=\"new\" text=\"\u65b0\u54c1\" color=\"green\">\n <div />\n </Badge.Ribbon>\n );\n }\n\n // \u4f18\u60e0\u6807\u7b7e\n if (product.discount_price && \n parseFloat(product.discount_price) < parseFloat(product.price)) {\n badges.push(\n <Badge.Ribbon key=\"discount\" text=\"\u9650\u65f6\u4f18\u60e0\" color=\"orange\">\n <div />\n </Badge.Ribbon>\n );\n }\n\n return badges[0]; // \u53ea\u663e\u793a\u4f18\u5148\u7ea7\u6700\u9ad8\u7684\u6807\u7b7e\n};\n```\n\n### \u8d2d\u7269\u8f66Hook\u8bbe\u8ba1\n\n```typescript\n// \u8d2d\u7269\u8f66\u72b6\u6001\u7ba1\u7406Hook\ninterface CartItem {\n id: number;\n product: Product;\n quantity: number;\n selected: boolean;\n}\n\ninterface UseCartReturn {\n items: CartItem[];\n totalItems: number;\n totalPrice: number;\n selectedItems: CartItem[];\n selectedTotalPrice: number;\n loading: boolean;\n addItem: (product: Product, quantity?: number) => Promise<void>;\n removeItem: (itemId: number) => Promise<void>;\n updateQuantity: (itemId: number, quantity: number) => Promise<void>;\n toggleSelect: (itemId: number) => void;\n selectAll: (selected: boolean) => void;\n clearCart: () => Promise<void>;\n refreshCart: () => Promise<void>;\n}\n\nfunction useCart(): UseCartReturn {\n const [items, setItems] = useState<CartItem[]>([]);\n const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n \n // \u8ba1\u7b97\u603b\u6570\u91cf\n const totalItems = useMemo(() => {\n return items.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.quantity, 0);\n }, [items]);\n \n // \u8ba1\u7b97\u603b\u4ef7\u683c\n const totalPrice = useMemo(() => {\n return items.reduce((sum, item) => {\n const price = parseFloat(item.product.discount_price || item.product.price);\n return sum + price * item.quantity;\n }, 0);\n }, [items]);\n \n // \u9009\u4e2d\u7684\u5546\u54c1\n const selectedItems = useMemo(() => {\n return items.filter(item => item.selected);\n }, [items]);\n \n // \u9009\u4e2d\u5546\u54c1\u7684\u603b\u4ef7\n const selectedTotalPrice = useMemo(() => {\n return selectedItems.reduce((sum, item) => {\n const price = parseFloat(item.product.discount_price || item.product.price);\n return sum + price * item.quantity;\n }, 0);\n }, [selectedItems]);\n \n // \u6dfb\u52a0\u5546\u54c1\u5230\u8d2d\u7269\u8f66\n const addItem = useCallback(async (product: Product, quantity = 1) => {\n try {\n setLoading(true);\n \n // \u68c0\u67e5\u5546\u54c1\u662f\u5426\u5df2\u5b58\u5728\n const existingItemIndex = items.findIndex(item => item.product.id === product.id);\n \n if (existingItemIndex > -1) {\n // \u66f4\u65b0\u6570\u91cf\n const newItems = [...items];\n newItems[existingItemIndex].quantity += quantity;\n setItems(newItems);\n \n // \u8c03\u7528API\u66f4\u65b0\n await api.cart.updateCartItem({\n id: newItems[existingItemIndex].id,\n quantity: newItems[existingItemIndex].quantity,\n });\n } else {\n // \u6dfb\u52a0\u65b0\u5546\u54c1\n const response = await api.cart.addToCart({\n product_id: product.id,\n quantity,\n });\n \n const newItem: CartItem = {\n id: response.data.id,\n product,\n quantity,\n selected: true,\n };\n \n setItems(prev => [...prev, newItem]);\n }\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u6dfb\u52a0\u5230\u8d2d\u7269\u8f66\u5931\u8d25:', error);\n throw error;\n } finally {\n setLoading(false);\n }\n }, [items]);\n \n // \u79fb\u9664\u5546\u54c1\n const removeItem = useCallback(async (itemId: number) => {\n try {\n setLoading(true);\n await api.cart.removeCartItem(itemId);\n setItems(prev => prev.filter(item => item.id !== itemId));\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u79fb\u9664\u5546\u54c1\u5931\u8d25:', error);\n throw error;\n } finally {\n setLoading(false);\n }\n }, []);\n \n // \u66f4\u65b0\u6570\u91cf\n const updateQuantity = useCallback(async (itemId: number, quantity: number) => {\n if (quantity <= 0) {\n await removeItem(itemId);\n return;\n }\n \n try {\n setLoading(true);\n await api.cart.updateCartItem({ id: itemId, quantity });\n setItems(prev => prev.map(item => \n item.id === itemId ? { ...item, quantity } : item\n ));\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u66f4\u65b0\u6570\u91cf\u5931\u8d25:', error);\n throw error;\n } finally {\n setLoading(false);\n }\n }, [removeItem]);\n \n // \u5207\u6362\u9009\u4e2d\u72b6\u6001\n const toggleSelect = useCallback((itemId: number) => {\n setItems(prev => prev.map(item => \n item.id === itemId ? { ...item, selected: !item.selected } : item\n ));\n }, []);\n \n // \u5168\u9009/\u53d6\u6d88\u5168\u9009\n const selectAll = useCallback((selected: boolean) => {\n setItems(prev => prev.map(item => ({ ...item, selected })));\n }, []);\n \n // \u6e05\u7a7a\u8d2d\u7269\u8f66\n const clearCart = useCallback(async () => {\n try {\n setLoading(true);\n await api.cart.clearCart();\n setItems([]);\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u6e05\u7a7a\u8d2d\u7269\u8f66\u5931\u8d25:', error);\n throw error;\n } finally {\n setLoading(false);\n }\n }, []);\n \n // \u5237\u65b0\u8d2d\u7269\u8f66\n const refreshCart = useCallback(async () => {\n try {\n setLoading(true);\n const response = await api.cart.getCart();\n const cartItems: CartItem[] = response.data.items.map(item => ({\n id: item.id,\n product: item.product,\n quantity: item.quantity,\n selected: item.selected || false,\n }));\n setItems(cartItems);\n } catch (error) {\n console.error('\u5237\u65b0\u8d2d\u7269\u8f66\u5931\u8d25:', error);\n } finally {\n setLoading(false);\n }\n }, []);\n \n // \u521d\u59cb\u5316\u65f6\u52a0\u8f7d\u8d2d\u7269\u8f66\n useEffect(() => {\n refreshCart();\n }, [refreshCart]);\n \n return {\n items,\n totalItems,\n totalPrice,\n selectedItems,\n selectedTotalPrice,\n loading,\n addItem,\n removeItem,\n updateQuantity,\n toggleSelect,\n selectAll,\n clearCart,\n refreshCart,\n };\n}\n\n// \u4f7f\u7528\u8d2d\u7269\u8f66Hook\u7684\u7ec4\u4ef6\nconst ShoppingCart: FC = () => {\n const {\n items,\n totalItems,\n selectedTotalPrice,\n loading,\n updateQuantity,\n removeItem,\n toggleSelect,\n selectAll,\n } = useCart();\n \n const [allSelected, setAllSelected] = useState(false);\n \n // \u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u5168\u9009\n useEffect(() => {\n setAllSelected(items.length > 0 && items.every(item => item.selected));\n }, [items]);\n \n const handleSelectAll = (checked: boolean) => {\n selectAll(checked);\n };\n \n const handleCheckout = () => {\n const selectedItems = items.filter(item => item.selected);\n if (selectedItems.length === 0) {\n message.warning('\u8bf7\u9009\u62e9\u8981\u7ed3\u7b97\u7684\u5546\u54c1');\n return;\n }\n \n // \u8df3\u8f6c\u5230\u7ed3\u7b97\u9875\u9762\n router.push('/checkout');\n };\n \n return (\n <div className=\"shopping-cart\">\n <div className=\"cart-header\">\n <Checkbox\n checked={allSelected}\n onChange={(e) => handleSelectAll(e.target.checked)}\n >\n \u5168\u9009\n </Checkbox>\n <span>\u5171 {totalItems} \u4ef6\u5546\u54c1</span>\n </div>\n \n <div className=\"cart-items\">\n {items.map(item => (\n <CartItemCard\n key={item.id}\n item={item}\n onQuantityChange={(quantity) => updateQuantity(item.id, quantity)}\n onRemove={() => removeItem(item.id)}\n onToggleSelect={() => toggleSelect(item.id)}\n />\n ))}\n </div>\n \n <div className=\"cart-footer\">\n <div className=\"total-price\">\n \u5408\u8ba1: \u00a5{selectedTotalPrice.toFixed(2)}\n </div>\n <Button\n type=\"primary\"\n size=\"large\"\n loading={loading}\n onClick={handleCheckout}\n disabled={items.filter(item => item.selected).length === 0}\n >\n \u53bb\u7ed3\u7b97\n </Button>\n </div>\n </div>\n );\n};\n```\n\n### \u8868\u5355\u7ec4\u4ef6\u8bbe\u8ba1\n\n```typescript\n// \u901a\u7528\u8868\u5355\u5b57\u6bb5\u7ec4\u4ef6\ninterface FormFieldProps {\n label: string;\n name: string;\n required?: boolean;\n error?: string;\n children: ReactNode;\n tooltip?: string;\n extra?: ReactNode;\n}\n\nconst FormField: FC<FormFieldProps> = ({\n label,\n name,\n required,\n error,\n children,\n tooltip,\n <ExclamationCircleOutlined />\n <span>{error}</span>\n </div>\n )}\n \n {extra && (\n <div className=\"form-extra\">\n {extra}\n </div>\n )}\n </div>\n );\n};\n\n// \u7528\u6237\u6ce8\u518c\u8868\u5355\u7ec4\u4ef6\ninterface RegisterFormData {\n username: string;\n email: string;\n password: string;\n confirmPassword: string;\n phone: string;\n agreeTerms: boolean;\n}\n\nconst RegisterForm: FC = () => {\n const form = useForm<RegisterFormData>({\n initialValues: {\n username: '',\n email: '',\n password: '',\n confirmPassword: '',\n phone: '',\n agreeTerms: false,\n },\n validationRules: {\n username: [\n validationRules.required('\u7528\u6237\u540d\u4e0d\u80fd\u4e3a\u7a7a'),\n validationRules.minLength(3, '\u7528\u6237\u540d\u81f3\u5c113\u4e2a\u5b57\u7b26'),\n validationRules.maxLength(20, '\u7528\u6237\u540d\u6700\u591a20\u4e2a\u5b57\u7b26'),\n validationRules.pattern(/^[a-zA-Z0-9_]+$/, validationRules.email('\u8bf7\u8f93\u5165\u6709\u6548\u7684\u90ae\u7bb1\u5730\u5740'),\n ],\n password: [\n validationRules.required('\u5bc6\u7801\u4e0d\u80fd\u4e3a\u7a7a'),\n '\u5bc6\u7801\u5fc5\u987b\u5305\u542b\u5927\u5c0f\u5199\u5b57\u6bcd\u548c\u6570\u5b57';\n }\n return null;\n },\n ],\n confirmPassword: [\n validationRules.required('\u8bf7\u786e\u8ba4\u5bc6\u7801'),\n (value: string) => {\n if (value !== form.values.password) {\n return '\u4e24\u6b21\u8f93\u5165\u7684\u5bc6\u7801\u4e0d\u4e00\u81f4';\n values.username,\n email: values.email,\n password: values.password,\n phone: values.phone,\n });\n \n message.success('\u6ce8\u518c\u6210\u529f\uff01');\n router.push('/login');\n } catch (error: any) {\n message.error(error.message || '\u6ce8\u518c\u5931\u8d25\uff0c\u8bf7\u91cd\u8bd5');\n }\n },\n });\n \n return (\n <form onSubmit={form.handleSubmit} className=\"register-form\">\n <FormField\n label=\"\u7528\u6237\u540d\"\n name=\"username\"\n required\n error={form.touched.username ? form.errors.username : undefined}\n tooltip=\"\u7528\u6237\u540d\u5c06\u4f5c\u4e3a\u60a8\u7684\u552f\u4e00\u6807\u8bc6\"\n >\n <Input\n placeholder=\"\u8bf7\u8f93\u5165\u7528\u6237\u540d\"\n value={form.values.username}\n onChange={form.handleChange('username')}\n onBlur={form.handleBlur('username')}\n status={form.touched.username && form.errors.username ? 'error' : ''}\n />\n </FormField>\n \n <FormField\n label=\"\u90ae\u7bb1\"\n name=\"email\"\n required\n error={form.touched.email ? form.errors.email : undefined}\n >\n <Input\n type=\"email\"\n placeholder=\"\u8bf7\u8f93\u5165\u90ae\u7bb1\u5730\u5740\"\n value={form.values.email}\n onChange={form.handleChange('email')}\n onBlur={form.handleBlur('email')}\n status={form.touched.email && form.errors.email ? 'error' : ''}\n />\n </FormField>\n \n <FormField\n label=\"\u5bc6\u7801\"\n name=\"password\"\n required\n error={form.touched.password ? form.errors.password : undefined}\n extra=\"\u5bc6\u7801\u5f3a\u5ea6: \u5305\u542b\u5927\u5c0f\u5199\u5b57\u6bcd\u548c\u6570\u5b57\uff0c\u81f3\u5c116\u4f4d\"\n >\n <Input.Password\n placeholder=\"\u8bf7\u8f93\u5165\u5bc6\u7801\"\n value={form.values.password}\n onChange={form.handleChange('password')}\n onBlur={form.handleBlur('password')}\n status={form.touched.password && form.errors.password ? 'error' : ''}\n />\n </FormField>\n \n <FormField\n label=\"\u786e\u8ba4\u5bc6\u7801\"\n name=\"confirmPassword\"\n required\n error={form.touched.confirmPassword ? form.errors.confirmPassword : undefined}\n >\n <Input.Password\n placeholder=\"\u8bf7\u518d\u6b21\u8f93\u5165\u5bc6\u7801\"\n value={form.values.confirmPassword}\n onChange={form.handleChange('confirmPassword')}\n onBlur={form.handleBlur('confirmPassword')}\n status={form.touched.confirmPassword && form.errors.confirmPassword ? 'error' : ''}\n />\n </FormField>\n \n <FormField\n label=\"\u624b\u673a\u53f7\"\n name=\"phone\"\n required\n error={form.touched.phone ? form.errors.phone : undefined}\n >\n <Input\n placeholder=\"\u8bf7\u8f93\u5165\u624b\u673a\u53f7\"\n value={form.values.phone}\n onChange={form.handleChange('phone')}\n onBlur={form.handleBlur('phone')}\n status={form.touched.phone && form.errors.phone ? 'error' : ''}\n />\n </FormField>\n \n <FormField\n label=\"\"\n name=\"agreeTerms\"\n error={form.touched.agreeTerms ? form.errors.agreeTerms : undefined}\n >\n <Checkbox\n checked={form.values.agreeTerms}\n onChange={form.handleChange('agreeTerms')}\n >\n \u6211\u5df2\u9605\u8bfb\u5e76\u540c\u610f\n <a href=\"/terms\" target=\"_blank\">\u300a\u7528\u6237\u534f\u8bae\u300b</a>\n \u548c\n <a href=\"/privacy\" target=\"_blank\">\u300a\u9690\u79c1\u653f\u7b56\u300b</a>\n </Checkbox>\n </FormField>\n \n <Button\n type=\"primary\"\n htmlType=\"submit\"\n size=\"large\"\n block\n loading={form.isSubmitting}\n disabled={!form.isValid}\n >\n \u6ce8\u518c\n </Button>\n </form>\n );\n};\n\n---\n\n## \ud83c\udfaf \u9762\u8bd5\u5e38\u8003\u77e5\u8bc6\u70b9\n\n### 1. React\u7ec4\u4ef6\u8bbe\u8ba1\u539f\u5219\n\n**Q: \u5982\u4f55\u8bbe\u8ba1\u4e00\u4e2a\u9ad8\u8d28\u91cf\u7684React\u7ec4\u4ef6\uff1f**\n\n**A: \u9ad8\u8d28\u91cfReact\u7ec4\u4ef6\u7684\u8bbe\u8ba1\u539f\u5219\uff1a**\n\n1. **\u5355\u4e00\u804c\u8d23\u539f\u5219**: \u6bcf\u4e2a\u7ec4\u4ef6\u53ea\u8d1f\u8d23\u4e00\u4e2a\u529f\u80fd\n2. **Props\u63a5\u53e3\u8bbe\u8ba1**: \u6e05\u6670\u3001\u5b8c\u6574\u3001\u7c7b\u578b\u5b89\u5168\u7684Props\u5b9a\u4e49\n3. **\u72b6\u6001\u7ba1\u7406**: \u5408\u7406\u533a\u5206\u672c\u5730\u72b6\u6001\u548c\u5168\u5c40\u72b6\u6001\n4. **\u6027\u80fd\u4f18\u5316**: \u4f7f\u7528memo\u3001useMemo\u3001useCallback\u907f\u514d\u4e0d\u5fc5\u8981\u7684\u91cd\u6e32\u67d3\n5. **\u9519\u8bef\u5904\u7406**: \u5b8c\u5584\u7684\u9519\u8bef\u8fb9\u754c\u548c\u5f02\u5e38\u5904\u7406\n6. **\u53ef\u8bbf\u95ee\u6027**: \u652f\u6301\u952e\u76d8\u5bfc\u822a\u3001\u5c4f\u5e55\u9605\u8bfb\u5668\u7b49\n\n```typescript\n// \u826f\u597d\u7684\u7ec4\u4ef6\u8bbe\u8ba1\u793a\u4f8b\ninterface ButtonProps {\n // \u6838\u5fc3\u529f\u80fd\n children: ReactNode;\n onClick?: () => void;\n \n // \u6837\u5f0f\u63a7\u5236\n variant?: 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'danger';\n size?: 'small' | 'medium' | 'large';\n \n // \u72b6\u6001\u63a7\u5236\n loading?: boolean;\n disabled?: boolean;\n \n // \u6269\u5c55\u6027\n className?: string;\n style?: CSSProperties;\n \n // \u53ef\u8bbf\u95ee\u6027\n 'aria-label'?: string;\n 'aria-describedby'?: string;\n}\n\nconst Button = memo<ButtonProps>(({ \n children, \n onClick, \n variant = 'primary',\n size = 'medium',\n loading = false,\n disabled = false,\n className,\n style,\n ...ariaProps \n}) => {\n const handleClick = useCallback((e: MouseEvent) => {\n if (loading || disabled) return;\n onClick?.(e);\n }, [onClick, loading, disabled]);\n \n return (\n <button\n className={`btn btn-${variant} btn-${size} ${className || ''}`}\n onClick={handleClick}\n disabled={disabled || loading}\n style={style}\n {...ariaProps}\n >\n {loading && <Spinner />}\n {children}\n </button>\n );\n});\n```\n\n### 2. Hooks\u4f7f\u7528\u6700\u4f73\u5b9e\u8df5\n\n**Q: \u5982\u4f55\u6b63\u786e\u4f7f\u7528React Hooks\uff1f**\n\n**A: React Hooks\u6700\u4f73\u5b9e\u8df5\uff1a**\n\n1. **\u4f9d\u8d56\u6570\u7ec4**: \u6b63\u786e\u8bbe\u7f6euseEffect\u3001useMemo\u3001useCallback\u7684\u4f9d\u8d56\n2. **\u81ea\u5b9a\u4e49Hooks**: \u63d0\u53d6\u53ef\u590d\u7528\u7684\u72b6\u6001\u903b\u8f91\n3. **\u6027\u80fd\u4f18\u5316**: \u907f\u514d\u5728\u6bcf\u6b21\u6e32\u67d3\u65f6\u521b\u5efa\u65b0\u7684\u5bf9\u8c61\u548c\u51fd\u6570\n4. **\u9519\u8bef\u5904\u7406**: \u5728\u5f02\u6b65\u64cd\u4f5c\u4e2d\u6b63\u786e\u5904\u7406\u9519\u8bef\u548c\u6e05\u7406\n\n```typescript\n// \u6b63\u786e\u7684Hooks\u4f7f\u7528\nconst UserProfile: FC<{ userId: number }> = ({ userId }) => {\n const [user, setUser] = useState<User | null>(null);\n const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);\n \n // \u6b63\u786e\u7684\u4f9d\u8d56\u6570\u7ec4\n const fetchUser = useCallback(async () => {\n try {\n setLoading(true);\n setError(null);\n const response = await api.getUser(userId);\n setUser(response.data);\n } catch (err) {\n setError(err.message);\n } finally {\n setLoading(false);\n }\n }, [userId]); // \u4f9d\u8d56userId\n \n // \u6e05\u7406\u526f\u4f5c\u7528\n useEffect(() => {\n let isCancelled = false;\n \n const loadUser = async () => {\n try {\n setLoading(true);\n const response = await api.getUser(userId);\n if (!isCancelled) {\n setUser(response.data);\n }\n } catch (err) {\n if (!isCancelled) {\n setError(err.message);\n }\n } finally {\n if (!isCancelled) {\n setLoading(false);\n }\n }\n };\n \n loadUser();\n \n return () => {\n isCancelled = true;\n };\n }, [userId]);\n \n // \u7f13\u5b58\u8ba1\u7b97\u7ed3\u679c\n const displayName = useMemo(() => {\n if (!user) return '';\n return `${user.firstName} ${user.lastName}`;\n }, [user]);\n \n if (loading) return <Loading />;\n if (error) return <Error message={error} />;\n if (!user) return <NotFound />;\n \n return <div>{displayName}</div>;\n};\n```\n\n### 3. \u7ec4\u4ef6\u901a\u4fe1\u6a21\u5f0f\n\n**Q: React\u7ec4\u4ef6\u95f4\u6709\u54ea\u4e9b\u901a\u4fe1\u65b9\u5f0f\uff1f\u5404\u81ea\u7684\u9002\u7528\u573a\u666f\uff1f**\n\n**A: React\u7ec4\u4ef6\u901a\u4fe1\u7684\u4e3b\u8981\u65b9\u5f0f\uff1a**\n\n1. **Props\u4f20\u9012**: \u7236\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\u901a\u4fe1\uff0c\u6570\u636e\u5411\u4e0b\u6d41\u52a8\n2. **\u56de\u8c03\u51fd\u6570**: \u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\u5411\u7236\u7ec4\u4ef6\u4f20\u9012\u6570\u636e\n3. **Context API**: \u8de8\u5c42\u7ea7\u7ec4\u4ef6\u901a\u4fe1\n4. **\u72b6\u6001\u7ba1\u7406\u5e93**: \u5168\u5c40\u72b6\u6001\u7ba1\u7406\uff08Redux\u3001Zustand\u7b49\uff09\n5. **\u4e8b\u4ef6\u603b\u7ebf**: \u677e\u8026\u5408\u7684\u7ec4\u4ef6\u901a\u4fe1\n6. **Ref**: \u76f4\u63a5\u8bbf\u95ee\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\u5b9e\u4f8b\n\n```typescript\n// 1. Props + \u56de\u8c03\u51fd\u6570\nconst Parent: FC = () => {\n const [count, setCount] = useState(0);\n \n return (\n <Child \n count={count} \n onCountChange={setCount} \n />\n );\n};\n\n// 2. Context API\nconst ThemeContext = createContext<{\n theme: string;\n setTheme: (theme: string) => void;\n}>({\n theme: 'light',\n setTheme: () => {},\n});\n\n// 3. \u81ea\u5b9a\u4e49Hook + Context\nconst useTheme = () => {\n const context = useContext(ThemeContext);\n if (!context) {\n throw new Error('useTheme must be used within ThemeProvider');\n }\n return context;\n};\n\n// 4. \u4e8b\u4ef6\u603b\u7ebf\nconst useEventBus = () => {\n const emit = useCallback((event: string, data: any) => {\n window.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent(event, { detail: data }));\n }, []);\n \n const on = useCallback((event: string, handler: (data: any) => void) => {\n const listener = (e: CustomEvent) => handler(e.detail);\n window.addEventListener(event, listener);\n return () => window.removeEventListener(event, listener);\n }, []);\n \n return { emit, on };\n};\n```\n\n### 4. \u6027\u80fd\u4f18\u5316\u7b56\u7565\n\n**Q: React\u5e94\u7528\u6709\u54ea\u4e9b\u6027\u80fd\u4f18\u5316\u7b56\u7565\uff1f**\n\n**A: React\u6027\u80fd\u4f18\u5316\u7684\u4e3b\u8981\u7b56\u7565\uff1a**\n\n1. **\u7ec4\u4ef6\u4f18\u5316**: React.memo\u3001PureComponent\n2. **Hook\u4f18\u5316**: useMemo\u3001useCallback\n3. **\u4ee3\u7801\u5206\u5272**: React.lazy\u3001\u52a8\u6001import\n4. **\u865a\u62df\u5316**: \u5927\u5217\u8868\u7684\u865a\u62df\u6eda\u52a8\n5. **\u9884\u52a0\u8f7d**: \u8d44\u6e90\u9884\u52a0\u8f7d\u548c\u9884\u53d6\n6. **\u7f13\u5b58\u7b56\u7565**: \u5408\u7406\u7684\u7f13\u5b58\u673a\u5236\n\n```typescript\n// \u7ec4\u4ef6\u7ea7\u4f18\u5316\nconst ExpensiveComponent = memo<Props>(({ data, onUpdate }) => {\n // \u7f13\u5b58\u590d\u6742\u8ba1\u7b97\n const processedData = useMemo(() => {\n return data.map(item => ({\n ...item,\n computed: expensiveCalculation(item),\n }));\n }, [data]);\n \n // \u7f13\u5b58\u4e8b\u4ef6\u5904\u7406\u51fd\u6570\n const handleUpdate = useCallback((id: number, updates: any) => {\n onUpdate(id, updates);\n }, [onUpdate]);\n \n return (\n <div>\n {processedData.map(item => (\n <ItemComponent\n key={item.id}\n item={item}\n onUpdate={handleUpdate}\n />\n ))}\n </div>\n );\n}, (prevProps, nextProps) => {\n // \u81ea\u5b9a\u4e49\u6bd4\u8f83\u51fd\u6570\n return (\n prevProps.data === nextProps.data &&\n prevProps.onUpdate === nextProps.onUpdate\n );\n});\n\n// \u4ee3\u7801\u5206\u5272\nconst LazyComponent = lazy(() => \n import('./HeavyComponent').then(module => ({\n default: module.HeavyComponent\n }))\n);\n\n// \u865a\u62df\u5316\u5927\u5217\u8868\nconst VirtualizedList: FC<{ items: any[] }> = ({ items }) => {\n return (\n <FixedSizeList\n height={600}\n itemCount={items.length}\n itemSize={50}\n itemData={items}\n >\n {({ index, style, data }) => (\n <div style={style}>\n <ListItem item={data[index]} />\n </div>\n )}\n </FixedSizeList>\n );\n};\n```\n\n---\n\n## \ud83c\udfcb\ufe0f \u5b9e\u6218\u7ec3\u4e60\n\n### \u7ec3\u4e601: \u8bbe\u8ba1\u4e00\u4e2a\u901a\u7528\u7684\u6570\u636e\u8868\u683c\u7ec4\u4ef6\n\n**\u9898\u76ee**: \u8bbe\u8ba1\u4e00\u4e2a\u529f\u80fd\u5b8c\u6574\u7684\u6570\u636e\u8868\u683c\u7ec4\u4ef6\uff0c\u652f\u6301\u6392\u5e8f\u3001\u7b5b\u9009\u3001\u5206\u9875\u7b49\u529f\u80fd\n\n**\u8981\u6c42**:\n1. \u652f\u6301\u81ea\u5b9a\u4e49\u5217\u914d\u7f6e\n2. \u5185\u7f6e\u6392\u5e8f\u548c\u7b5b\u9009\u529f\u80fd\n3. \u652f\u6301\u5206\u9875\u548c\u865a\u62df\u6eda\u52a8\n4. \u63d0\u4f9b\u884c\u9009\u62e9\u529f\u80fd\n5. \u652f\u6301\u81ea\u5b9a\u4e49\u6e32\u67d3\u5668\n\n**\u89e3\u51b3\u65b9\u6848**:\n\n```typescript\n// \u5217\u914d\u7f6e\u7c7b\u578b\ninterface TableColumn<T> {\n key: keyof T;\n title: string;\n width?: number;\n sortable?: boolean;\n filterable?: boolean;\n render?: (value: any, record: T, index: number) => ReactNode;\n align?: 'left' | 'center' | 'right';\n fixed?: 'left' | 'right';\n}\n\n// \u8868\u683cProps\u7c7b\u578b\ninterface DataTableProps<T> {\n columns: TableColumn<T>[];\n data: T[];\n loading?: boolean;\n pagination?: {\n current: number;\n pageSize: number;\n total: number;\n onChange: (page: number, pageSize: number) => void;\n };\n rowSelection?: {\n selectedRowKeys: React.Key[];\n onChange: (selectedRowKeys: React.Key[], selectedRows: T[]) => void;\n getCheckboxProps?: (record: T) => { disabled?: boolean };\n };\n onSort?: (key: keyof T, direction: 'asc' | 'desc' | null) => void;\n onFilter?: (key: keyof T, value: any) => void;\n rowKey: keyof T | ((record: T) => React.Key);\n size?: 'small' | 'middle' | 'large';\n bordered?: boolean;\n virtual?: boolean;\n height?: number;\n}\n\nfunction DataTable<T extends Record<string, any>>({\n columns,\n data,\n loading = false,\n pagination,\n rowSelection,\n onSort,\n onFilter,\n rowKey,\n size = 'middle',\n bordered = false,\n virtual = false,\n height = 400,\n}: DataTableProps<T>): JSX.Element {\n const [sortConfig, setSortConfig] = useState<{\n key: keyof T | null;\n direction: 'asc' | 'desc' | null;\n }>({ key: null, direction: null });\n \n const [filters, setFilters] = useState<Record<keyof T, any>>({} as Record<keyof T, any>);\n const [selectedKeys, setSelectedKeys] = useState<React.Key[]>([]);\n \n // \u83b7\u53d6\u884c\u7684key\n const getRowKey = useCallback((record: T, index: number): React.Key => {\n if (typeof rowKey === 'function') {\n return rowKey(record);\n }\n return record[rowKey] as React.Key;\n }, [rowKey]);\n \n // \u5904\u7406\u6392\u5e8f\n const handleSort = useCallback((key: keyof T) => {\n let direction: 'asc' | 'desc' | null = 'asc';\n \n if (sortConfig.key === key) {\n if (sortConfig.direction === 'asc') {\n direction = 'desc';\n } else if (sortConfig.direction === 'desc') {\n direction = null;\n }\n }\n \n setSortConfig({ key: direction ? key : null, direction });\n onSort?.(key, direction);\n }, [sortConfig, onSort]);\n \n // \u5904\u7406\u7b5b\u9009\n const handleFilter = useCallback((key: keyof T, value: any) => {\n const newFilters = { ...filters, [key]: value };\n setFilters(newFilters);\n onFilter?.(key, value);\n }, [filters, onFilter]);\n \n // \u5904\u7406\u884c\u9009\u62e9\n const handleRowSelect = useCallback((record: T, selected: boolean) => {\n const key = getRowKey(record, 0);\n let newSelectedKeys: React.Key[];\n \n if (selected) {\n newSelectedKeys = [...selectedKeys, key];\n } else {\n newSelectedKeys = selectedKeys.filter(k => k !== key);\n }\n \n setSelectedKeys(newSelectedKeys);\n \n if (rowSelection) {\n const selectedRows = data.filter(item => \n newSelectedKeys.includes(getRowKey(item, 0))\n );\n rowSelection.onChange(newSelectedKeys, selectedRows);\n }\n }, [selectedKeys, data, getRowKey, rowSelection]);\n \n // \u5168\u9009\u5904\u7406\n const handleSelectAll = useCallback((selected: boolean) => {\n const newSelectedKeys = selected \n ? data.map((record, index) => getRowKey(record, index))\n : [];\n \n setSelectedKeys(newSelectedKeys);\n \n if (rowSelection) {\n const selectedRows = selected ? data : [];\n rowSelection.onChange(newSelectedKeys, selectedRows);\n }\n }, [data, getRowKey, rowSelection]);\n \n // \u6e32\u67d3\u8868\u5934\n const renderHeader = () => (\n <thead>\n <tr>\n {rowSelection && (\n <th style={{ width: 50 }}>\n <Checkbox\n checked={selectedKeys.length === data.length && data.length > 0}\n indeterminate={selectedKeys.length > 0 && selectedKeys.length < data.length}\n onChange={(e) => handleSelectAll(e.target.checked)}\n />\n </th>\n )}\n {columns.map(column => (\n <th\n key={String(column.key)}\n style={{\n width: column.width,\n textAlign: column.align || 'left',\n cursor: column.sortable ? 'pointer' : 'default',\n }}\n onClick={() => column.sortable && handleSort(column.key)}\n >\n <div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 8 }}>\n <span>{column.title}</span>\n {column.sortable && (\n <div style={{ display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' }}>\n <CaretUpOutlined\n style={{\n fontSize: 10,\n color: sortConfig.key === column.key && sortConfig.direction === 'asc' \n ? '#1890ff' : '#bfbfbf'\n }}\n />\n <CaretDownOutlined\n style={{\n fontSize: 10,\n color: sortConfig.key === column.key && sortConfig.direction === 'desc' \n ? '#1890ff' : '#bfbfbf'\n }}\n />\n </div>\n )}\n {column.filterable && (\n <FilterDropdown\n column={column}\n value={filters[column.key]}\n onChange={(value) => handleFilter(column.key, value)}\n />\n )}\n </div>\n </th>\n ))}\n </tr>\n </thead>\n );\n \n // \u6e32\u67d3\u8868\u683c\u884c\n const renderRow = (record: T, index: number) => {\n const key = getRowKey(record, index);\n const isSelected = selectedKeys.includes(key);\n \n return (\n <tr\n key={key}\n style={{\n backgroundColor: isSelected ? '#e6f7ff' : undefined,\n }}\n >\n {rowSelection && (\n <td>\n <Checkbox\n checked={isSelected}\n onChange={(e) => handleRowSelect(record, e.target.checked)}\n {...(rowSelection.getCheckboxProps?.(record) || {})}\n />\n </td>\n )}\n {columns.map(column => (\n <td\n key={String(column.key)}\n style={{\n textAlign: column.align || 'left',\n padding: size === 'small' ? '8px' : size === 'large' ? maxAttempts; attempt++) {\n try {\n return await originalMethod.apply(this, args);\n } catch (error) {\n lastError = error as Error;\n console.log(`\u65b9\u6cd5 ${propertyKey} \u7b2c ${attempt} \u6b21\u5c1d\u8bd5\u5931\u8d25:`, error);\n \n if (attempt < maxAttempts) {\n console.log(`\u7b49\u5f85 ${delay}ms \u540e\u91cd\u8bd5...`);\n await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, delay));\n }\n }\n }\n \n throw new Error(`\u65b9\u6cd5 ${propertyKey} \u5728 ${maxAttempts} \u6b21\u5c1d\u8bd5\u540e\u4ecd\u7136\u5931\u8d25: ${lastError.message}`);\n };\n };\n}\n\n// Mall-Frontend\u4e2d\u7684\u652f\u4ed8\u670d\u52a1\nclass PaymentService {\n @Retry(3, 2000) // \u6700\u591a\u91cd\u8bd53\u6b21\uff0c\u95f4\u96942\u79d2\n async processPayment(orderId: number, amount: number) {\n console.log(`\u5904\u7406\u8ba2\u5355 ${orderId} \u7684\u652f\u4ed8\uff0c\u91d1\u989d: ${amount}`);\n \n // \u6a21\u62df\u53ef\u80fd\u5931\u8d25\u7684\u652f\u4ed8API\u8c03\u7528\n const response = await fetch('/api/payments', {\n method: 'POST',\n headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },\n body: JSON.stringify({ orderId, amount }),\n });\n \n if (!response.ok) {\n throw new Error(`\u652f\u4ed8\u5931\u8d25: ${response.status}`);\n }\n \n return response.json();\n }\n}\n```\n\n### \u6027\u80fd\u76d1\u63a7\u88c5\u9970\u5668\n\n```typescript\n// \u6027\u80fd\u76d1\u63a7\u88c5\u9970\u5668\nfunction Performance(threshold: number = 1000) {\n return function(target: any, propertyKey: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {\n const originalMethod = descriptor.value;\n \n descriptor.value = async function(...args: any[]) {\n const startTime = performance.now();\n \n try {\n const result = await originalMethod.apply(this, args);\n const endTime = performance.now();\n const duration = endTime - startTime;\n \n if (duration > threshold) {\n console.warn(`\u26a0\ufe0f \u65b9\u6cd5 ${propertyKey} \u6267\u884c\u65f6\u95f4\u8fc7\u957f: ${duration.toFixed(2)}ms`);\n } else {\n console.log(`\u2705 \u65b9\u6cd5 ${propertyKey} \u6267\u884c\u65f6\u95f4: ${duration.toFixed(2)}ms`);\n }\n \n return result;\n } catch (error) {\n const endTime = performance.now();\n const duration = endTime - startTime;\n console.error(`\u274c \u65b9\u6cd5 ${propertyKey} \u6267\u884c\u5931\u8d25 (${duration.toFixed(2)}ms):`, error);\n throw error;\n }\n };\n };\n}\n\n// Mall-Frontend\u4e2d\u7684\u641c\u7d22\u670d\u52a1\nclass SearchService {\n @Performance(500) // \u8d85\u8fc7500ms\u5c31\u8b66\u544a\n async searchProducts(query: string, filters: any) {\n console.log(`\u641c\u7d22\u5546\u54c1: ${query}`);\n \n // \u6a21\u62df\u590d\u6742\u7684\u641c\u7d22\u903b\u8f91\n const response = await fetch('/api/search', {\n method: 'POST',\n headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },\n body: JSON.stringify({ query, filters }),\n });\n \n return response.json();\n }\n \n @Performance(200) // \u8d85\u8fc7200ms\u5c31\u8b66\u544a\n async getSearchSuggestions(query: string) {\n const response = await fetch(`/api/search/suggestions?q=${query}`);\n return response.json();\n }\n}\n```\n\n---\n\n## \ud83c\udff7\ufe0f \u5c5e\u6027\u88c5\u9970\u5668\uff1a\u5c5e\u6027\u7684\u9b54\u6cd5\u589e\u5f3a\n\n### \u9a8c\u8bc1\u88c5\u9970\u5668\n\n```typescript\n// \u9a8c\u8bc1\u88c5\u9970\u5668\nfunction Required(target: any, propertyKey: string) {\n // \u5b58\u50a8\u9700\u8981\u9a8c\u8bc1\u7684\u5c5e\u6027\n const requiredProperties = Reflect.getMetadata('required', target) || [];\n requiredProperties.push(propertyKey);\n Reflect.defineMetadata('required', requiredProperties, target);\n}\n\nfunction MinLength(length: number) {\n return function(target: any, propertyKey: string) {\n const minLengthProperties = Reflect.getMetadata('minLength', target) || {};\n minLengthProperties[propertyKey] = length;\n Reflect.defineMetadata('minLength', minLengthProperties, target);\n };\n}\n\nfunction Email(target: any, propertyKey: string) {\n const emailProperties = Reflect.getMetadata('email', target) || [];\n emailProperties.push(propertyKey);\n Reflect.defineMetadata('email', emailProperties, target);\n}\n\n// \u9a8c\u8bc1\u51fd\u6570\nfunction validate(obj: any): string[] {\n const errors: string[] = [];\n \n // \u68c0\u67e5\u5fc5\u586b\u5b57\u6bb5\n const requiredProperties = Reflect.getMetadata('required', obj) || [];\n for (const prop of requiredProperties) {\n if (!obj[prop]) {\n errors.push(`${prop} \u662f\u5fc5\u586b\u5b57\u6bb5`);\n }\n }\n \n // \u68c0\u67e5\u6700\u5c0f\u957f\u5ea6\n const minLengthProperties = Reflect.getMetadata('minLength', obj) || {};\n for (const [prop, minLength] of Object.entries(minLengthProperties)) {\n if (obj[prop] && obj[prop].length < (minLength as number)) {\n errors.push(`${prop} \u6700\u5c11\u9700\u8981 ${minLength} \u4e2a\u5b57\u7b26`);\n }\n }\n \n // \u68c0\u67e5\u90ae\u7bb1\u683c\u5f0f\n const emailProperties = Reflect.getMetadata('email', obj) || [];\n for (const prop of emailProperties) {\n if (obj[prop] && !/^[^\\s@]+@[^\\s@]+\\.[^\\s@]+$/.test(obj[prop])) {\n errors.push(`${prop} \u90ae\u7bb1\u683c\u5f0f\u4e0d\u6b63\u786e`);\n }\n }\n \n return errors;\n}\n\n// Mall-Frontend\u4e2d\u7684\u7528\u6237\u6ce8\u518c\u8868\u5355\nclass UserRegistrationForm {\n @Required\n @MinLength(3)\n username: string = '';\n \n @Required\n @Email\n email: string = '';\n \n @Required\n @MinLength(6)\n password: string = '';\n \n constructor(data: Partial<UserRegistrationForm>) {\n Object.assign(this, data);\n }\n \n validate(): string[] {\n return validate(this);\n }\n}\n\n// \u4f7f\u7528\u793a\u4f8b\nconst form = new UserRegistrationForm({\n username: 'jo',\n email: 'invalid-email',\n password: '123'\n});\n\nconst errors = form.validate();\nconsole.log(errors);\n// ['username \u6700\u5c11\u9700\u8981 3 \u4e2a\u5b57\u7b26', 'email \u90ae\u7bb1\u683c\u5f0f\u4e0d\u6b63\u786e', 'password \u6700\u5c11\u9700\u8981 6 \u4e2a\u5b57\u7b26']\n```\n\n### \u683c\u5f0f\u5316\u88c5\u9970\u5668\n\n```typescript\n// \u683c\u5f0f\u5316\u88c5\u9970\u5668\nfunction Format(formatter: (value: any) => any) {\n return function(target: any, propertyKey: string) {\n let value = target[propertyKey];\n \n Object.defineProperty(target, propertyKey, {\n get() {\n return value;\n },\n set(newValue: any) {\n value = formatter(newValue);\n },\n enumerable: true,\n configurable: true\n });\n };\n}\n\n// \u5e38\u7528\u683c\u5f0f\u5316\u51fd\u6570\nconst formatters = {\n currency: (value: number) => `\u00a5${value.toFixed(2)}`,\n phone: (value: string) => value.replace(/(\\d{3})(\\d{4})(\\d{4})/, '$1-$2-$3'),\n date: (value: Date) => value.toLocaleDateString('zh-CN'),\n uppercase: (value: string) => value.toUpperCase(),\n trim: (value: string) => value.trim()\n};\n\n// Mall-Frontend\u4e2d\u7684\u5546\u54c1\u6a21\u578b\nclass Product {\n @Format(formatters.trim)\n @Format(formatters.uppercase)\n name: string = '';\n \n @Format(formatters.currency)\n price: number = 0;\n \n @Format(formatters.date)\n createdAt: Date = new Date();\n \n constructor(data: Partial<Product>) {\n Object.assign(this, data);\n }\n}\n\nconst product = new Product({\n name: ' iphone 15 pro ',\n price: 7999,\n createdAt: new Date()\n});\n\nconsole.log(product.name); // \"IPHONE 15 PRO\"\nconsole.log(product.price); // \"\u00a57999.00\"\n```\n\n---\n\n## \ud83d\udccb \u53c2\u6570\u88c5\u9970\u5668\uff1a\u53c2\u6570\u7684\u667a\u80fd\u5904\u7406\n\n### \u53c2\u6570\u9a8c\u8bc1\u88c5\u9970\u5668\n\n```typescript\n// \u53c2\u6570\u9a8c\u8bc1\u88c5\u9970\u5668\nfunction ValidateParam(validator: (value: any) => boolean, message: string) {\n return function(target: any, propertyKey: string, parameterIndex: number) {\n const existingValidators = Reflect.getMetadata('paramValidators', target, propertyKey) || {};\n existingValidators[parameterIndex] = { validator, message };\n Reflect.defineMetadata('paramValidators', existingValidators, target, propertyKey);\n };\n}\n\n// \u65b9\u6cd5\u88c5\u9970\u5668\uff1a\u6267\u884c\u53c2\u6570\u9a8c\u8bc1\nfunction ValidateParams(target: any, propertyKey: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {\n const originalMethod = descriptor.value;\n \n descriptor.value = function(...args: any[]) {\n const validators = Reflect.getMetadata('paramValidators', target, propertyKey) || {};\n \n for (const [index, { validator, message }] of Object.entries(validators)) {\n const paramIndex = parseInt(index);\n const paramValue = args[paramIndex];\n \n if (!validator(paramValue)) {\n throw new Error(`\u53c2\u6570 ${paramIndex} \u9a8c\u8bc1\u5931\u8d25: ${message}`);\n }\n }\n \n return originalMethod.apply(this, args);\n };\n}\n\n// \u5e38\u7528\u9a8c\u8bc1\u5668\nconst validators = {\n isPositive: (value: number) => value > 0,\n isEmail: (value: string) => /^[^\\s@]+@[^\\s@]+\\.[^\\s@]+$/.test(value),\n isNotEmpty: (value: string) => value.trim().length > 0,\n isValidId: (value: number) => Number.isInteger(value) && value > 0\n};\n\n// Mall-Frontend\u4e2d\u7684\u8ba2\u5355\u670d\u52a1\nclass OrderService {\n @ValidateParams\n async createOrder(\n @ValidateParam(validators.isValidId, '\u7528\u6237ID\u5fc5\u987b\u662f\u6b63\u6574\u6570')\n userId: number,\n \n @ValidateParam(validators.isPositive, '\u603b\u91d1\u989d\u5fc5\u987b\u5927\u4e8e0')\n totalAmount: number,\n \n @ValidateParam(validators.isNotEmpty, '\u6536\u8d27\u5730\u5740\u4e0d\u80fd\u4e3a\u7a7a')\n shippingAddress: string\n ) {\n console.log('\u521b\u5efa\u8ba2\u5355:', { userId, totalAmount, shippingAddress });\n \n // \u5b9e\u9645\u7684\u8ba2\u5355\u521b\u5efa\u903b\u8f91\n return {\n id: Date.now(),\n userId,\n totalAmount,\n shippingAddress,\n status: 'pending'\n };\n }\n}\n\n// \u4f7f\u7528\u793a\u4f8b\nconst orderService = new OrderService();\n\ntry {\n await orderService.createOrder(1, 99.99, '\u5317\u4eac\u5e02\u671d\u9633\u533axxx\u8857\u9053');\n console.log('\u8ba2\u5355\u521b\u5efa\u6210\u529f');\n} catch (error) {\n console.error(error.message);\n}\n\ntry {\n await orderService.createOrder(-1, 99.99, ''); // \u53c2\u6570\u9a8c\u8bc1\u5931\u8d25\n} catch (error) {\n console.error(error.message); // \"\u53c2\u6570 0 \u9a8c\u8bc1\u5931\u8d25: \u7528\u6237ID\u5fc5\u987b\u662f\u6b63\u6574\u6570\"\n}\n```\n\n---\n\n## \ud83d\udd0d \u5143\u6570\u636e\u7f16\u7a0b\uff1aReflect Metadata\n\n### \u5b89\u88c5\u548c\u914d\u7f6e\n\n```bash\nnpm install reflect-metadata\n```\n\n```typescript\n// \u5728\u5e94\u7528\u5165\u53e3\u5bfc\u5165\nimport 'reflect-metadata';\n\n// \u6216\u5728tsconfig.json\u4e2d\u914d\u7f6e\n{\n \"compilerOptions\": {\n \"experimentalDecorators\": true,\n \"emitDecoratorMetadata\": true\n }\n}\n```\n\n### \u4f9d\u8d56\u6ce8\u5165\u7cfb\u7edf\n\n```typescript\nimport 'reflect-metadata';\n\n// \u4f9d\u8d56\u6ce8\u5165\u5bb9\u5668\nclass Container {\n private services = new Map<string, any>();\n private singletons = new Map<string, any>();\n \n register<T>(token: string, implementation: new (...args: any[]) => T, singleton = false) {\n this.services.set(token, { implementation, singleton });\n }\n \n resolve<T>(token: string): T {\n const service = this.services.get(token);\n if (!service) {\n throw new Error(`\u670d\u52a1 ${token} \u672a\u6ce8\u518c`);\n }\n \n if (service.singleton) {\n if (!this.singletons.has(token)) {\n const instance = this.createInstance(service.implementation);\n this.singletons.set(token, instance);\n }\n return this.singletons.get(token);\n }\n \n return this.createInstance(service.implementation);\n }\n \n private createInstance<T>(constructor: new (...args: any[]) => T): T {\n // \u83b7\u53d6\u6784\u9020\u51fd\u6570\u7684\u53c2\u6570\u7c7b\u578b\n const paramTypes = Reflect.getMetadata('design:paramtypes', constructor) || [];\n \n // \u89e3\u6790\u4f9d\u8d56\n const dependencies = paramTypes.map((type: any) => {\n const token = Reflect.getMetadata('inject:token', type) || type.name;\n return this.resolve(token);\n });\n \n return new constructor(...dependencies);\n }\n}\n\n// \u88c5\u9970\u5668\nfunction Injectable(token?: string) {\n return function<T extends { new(...args: any[]): {} }>(constructor: T) {\n const actualToken = token || constructor.name;\n Reflect.defineMetadata('inject:token', actualToken, constructor);\n return constructor;\n };\n}\n\nfunction Inject(token: string) {\n return function(target: any, propertyKey: string | symbol | undefined, parameterIndex: number) {\n const existingTokens = Reflect.getMetadata('inject:tokens', target) || [];\n existingTokens[parameterIndex] = token;\n Reflect.defineMetadata('inject:tokens', existingTokens, target);\n };\n}\n\n// Mall-Frontend\u4e2d\u7684\u670d\u52a1\n@Injectable('ApiClient')\nclass ApiClient {\n constructor(private baseURL: string = 'http://localhost:8080') {}\n \n async get(endpoint: string) {\n return fetch(`${this.baseURL}${endpoint}`);\n }\n}\n\n@Injectable('ProductService')\nclass ProductService {\n constructor(private apiClient: ApiClient) {}\n \n async getProducts() {\n return this.apiClient.get('/api/products');\n }\n}\n\n@Injectable('CartService')\nclass CartService {\n constructor(\n private apiClient: ApiClient,\n private productService: ProductService\n ) {}\n \n async addToCart(productId: number, quantity: number) {\n const product = await this.productService.getProducts();\n return this.apiClient.get(`/api/cart/add/${productId}/${quantity}`);\n }\n}\n\n// \u4f7f\u7528\u5bb9\u5668\nconst container = new Container();\n\n// \u6ce8\u518c\u670d\u52a1\ncontainer.register('ApiClient', ApiClient, true); // \u5355\u4f8b\ncontainer.register('ProductService', ProductService);\ncontainer.register('CartService', CartService);\n\n// \u89e3\u6790\u670d\u52a1\nconst cartService = container.resolve<CartService>('CartService');\ncartService.addToCart(1, 2);\n```\n\n---\n\n## \ud83c\udfaf \u9762\u8bd5\u5e38\u8003\u77e5\u8bc6\u70b9\n\n### 1. \u88c5\u9970\u5668\u7684\u6267\u884c\u65f6\u673a\n\n**Q: \u88c5\u9970\u5668\u4ec0\u4e48\u65f6\u5019\u6267\u884c\uff1f\u6267\u884c\u987a\u5e8f\u662f\u600e\u6837\u7684\uff1f**\n\n**A: \u88c5\u9970\u5668\u6267\u884c\u65f6\u673a\u548c\u987a\u5e8f\uff1a**\n\n1. **\u6267\u884c\u65f6\u673a**: \u88c5\u9970\u5668\u5728\u7c7b\u5b9a\u4e49\u65f6\u6267\u884c\uff0c\u4e0d\u662f\u5728\u5b9e\u4f8b\u5316\u65f6\n2. **\u6267\u884c\u987a\u5e8f**: \n - \u5c5e\u6027\u88c5\u9970\u5668 \u2192 \u53c2\u6570\u88c5\u9970\u5668 \u2192 \u65b9\u6cd5\u88c5\u9970\u5668 \u2192 \u7c7b\u88c5\u9970\u5668\n - \u591a\u4e2a\u540c\u7c7b\u578b\u88c5\u9970\u5668\uff1a\u4ece\u4e0b\u5230\u4e0a\u6267\u884c\n\n```typescript\nfunction first() {\n console.log('first(): factory evaluated');\n return function (target: any, propertyKey: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {\n console.log('first(): called');\n };\n}\n\nfunction second() {\n console.log('second(): factory evaluated');\n return function (target: any, propertyKey: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {\n console.log('second(): called');\n };\n}\n\nclass Example {\n @first()\n @second()\n method() {}\n}\n\n// \u8f93\u51fa\uff1a\n// first(): factory evaluated\n// second(): factory evaluated\n// second(): called\n// first(): called\n```\n\n### 2. \u88c5\u9970\u5668\u7684\u7c7b\u578b\u548c\u53c2\u6570\n\n**Q: \u4e0d\u540c\u7c7b\u578b\u7684\u88c5\u9970\u5668\u63a5\u6536\u4ec0\u4e48\u53c2\u6570\uff1f**\n\n**A: \u88c5\u9970\u5668\u53c2\u6570\u8be6\u89e3\uff1a**\n\n```typescript\n// \u7c7b\u88c5\u9970\u5668\nfunction ClassDecorator(constructor: Function) {\n // constructor: \u7c7b\u7684\u6784\u9020\u51fd\u6570\n}\n\n// \u65b9\u6cd5\u88c5\u9970\u5668\nfunction MethodDecorator(\n target: any, // \u7c7b\u7684\u539f\u578b\u5bf9\u8c61\n propertyKey: string, // \u65b9\u6cd5\u540d\n descriptor: PropertyDescriptor // \u5c5e\u6027\u63cf\u8ff0\u7b26\n) {}\n\n// \u5c5e\u6027\u88c5\u9970\u5668\nfunction PropertyDecorator(\n target: any, // \u7c7b\u7684\u539f\u578b\u5bf9\u8c61\n propertyKey: string // \u5c5e\u6027\u540d\n) {}\n\n// \u53c2\u6570\u88c5\u9970\u5668\nfunction ParameterDecorator(\n target: any, // \u7c7b\u7684\u539f\u578b\u5bf9\u8c61\n propertyKey: string, // \u65b9\u6cd5\u540d\n parameterIndex: number // \u53c2\u6570\u7d22\u5f15\n) {}\n```\n\n### 3. \u88c5\u9970\u5668\u7684\u5b9e\u9645\u5e94\u7528\u573a\u666f\n\n**Q: \u88c5\u9970\u5668\u5728\u5b9e\u9645\u9879\u76ee\u4e2d\u6709\u54ea\u4e9b\u5e94\u7528\u573a\u666f\uff1f**\n\n**A: \u5e38\u89c1\u5e94\u7528\u573a\u666f\uff1a**\n\n1. **\u4f9d\u8d56\u6ce8\u5165** - Angular\u3001NestJS\n2. **\u6570\u636e\u9a8c\u8bc1** - class-validator\n3. **ORM\u6620\u5c04** - TypeORM\n4. **\u7f13\u5b58\u63a7\u5236** - \u65b9\u6cd5\u7ea7\u7f13\u5b58\n5. **\u65e5\u5fd7\u8bb0\u5f55** - \u81ea\u52a8\u65e5\u5fd7\n6. **\u6743\u9650\u63a7\u5236** - \u8def\u7531\u5b88\u536b\n7. **\u6027\u80fd\u76d1\u63a7** - \u65b9\u6cd5\u6267\u884c\u65f6\u95f4\n\n---\n\n## \ud83c\udfcb\ufe0f \u5b9e\u6218\u7ec3\u4e60\n\n### \u7ec3\u4e601: \u5b9e\u73b0\u4e00\u4e2a\u5b8c\u6574\u7684\u9a8c\u8bc1\u7cfb\u7edf\n\n**\u9898\u76ee**: \u4e3aMall-Frontend\u521b\u5efa\u4e00\u4e2a\u57fa\u4e8e\u88c5\u9970\u5668\u7684\u8868\u5355\u9a8c\u8bc1\u7cfb\u7edf\n\n**\u8981\u6c42**:\n1. \u652f\u6301\u591a\u79cd\u9a8c\u8bc1\u89c4\u5219\uff08\u5fc5\u586b\u3001\u957f\u5ea6\u3001\u683c\u5f0f\u7b49\uff09\n2. \u652f\u6301\u81ea\u5b9a\u4e49\u9a8c\u8bc1\u5668\n3. \u63d0\u4f9b\u53cb\u597d\u7684\u9519\u8bef\u4fe1\u606f\n4. \u652f\u6301\u5f02\u6b65\u9a8c\u8bc1\n\n**\u89e3\u51b3\u65b9\u6848**:\n\n```typescript\n// \u9a8c\u8bc1\u88c5\u9970\u5668\u7cfb\u7edf\nimport 'reflect-metadata';\n\n// \u9a8c\u8bc1\u89c4\u5219\u63a5\u53e3\ninterface ValidationRule {\n validator: (value: any) => boolean | Promise<boolean>;\n message: string;\n async?: boolean;\n}\n\n// \u9a8c\u8bc1\u88c5\u9970\u5668\nfunction Validate(rule: ValidationRule) {\n return function(target: any, propertyKey: string) {\n const rules = Reflect.getMetadata('validation:rules', target) || {};\n if (!rules[propertyKey]) {\n rules[propertyKey] = [];\n }\n rules[propertyKey].push(rule);\n Reflect.defineMetadata('validation:rules', rules, target);\n };\n}\n\n// \u9884\u5b9a\u4e49\u9a8c\u8bc1\u89c4\u5219\nconst ValidationRules = {\n required: (message = '\u6b64\u5b57\u6bb5\u4e3a\u5fc5\u586b\u9879') => ({\n validator: (value: any) => value !== null && value !== undefined && value !== '',\n message\n }),\n \n minLength: (length: number, message?: string) => ({\n validator: (value: string) => !value || value.length >= length,\n message: message || `\u6700\u5c11\u9700\u8981${length}\u4e2a\u5b57\u7b26`\n }),\n \n maxLength: (length: number, message?: string) => ({\n validator: (value: string) => !value || value.length <= length,\n message: message || `\u6700\u591a\u5141\u8bb8${length}\u4e2a\u5b57\u7b26`\n }),\n \n email: (message = '\u90ae\u7bb1\u683c\u5f0f\u4e0d\u6b63\u786e') => ({\n validator: (value: string) => !value || /^[^\\s@]+@[^\\s@]+\\.[^\\s@]+$/.test(value),\n message\n }),\n \n phone: (message = '\u624b\u673a\u53f7\u683c\u5f0f\u4e0d\u6b63\u786e') => ({\n validator: (value: string) => !value || /^1[3-9]\\d{9}$/.test(value),\n message\n }),\n \n uniqueUsername: (message = '\u7528\u6237\u540d\u5df2\u5b58\u5728') => ({\n validator: async (value: string) => {\n if (!value) return true;\n // \u6a21\u62df\u5f02\u6b65\u9a8c\u8bc1\n const response = await fetch(`/api/users/check-username?username=${value}`);\n const result = await response.json();\n return result.available;\n },\n message,\n async: true\n })\n};\n\n// \u9a8c\u8bc1\u5668\u7c7b\nclass Validator {\n static async validate(obj: any): Promise<{ [key: string]: string[] }> {\n const rules = Reflect.getMetadata('validation:rules', obj) || {};\n const errors: { [key: string]: string[] } = {};\n \n for (const [property, propertyRules] of Object.entries(rules)) {\n const value = obj[property];\n const propertyErrors: string[] = [];\n \n for (const rule of propertyRules as ValidationRule[]) {\n try {\n const isValid = rule.async \n ? await rule.validator(value)\n : rule.validator(value);\n \n if (!isValid) {\n propertyErrors.push(rule.message);\n }\n } catch (error) {\n propertyErrors.push(`\u9a8c\u8bc1\u8fc7\u7a0b\u4e2d\u53d1\u751f\u9519\u8bef: ${error.message}`);\n }\n }\n \n if (propertyErrors.length > 0) {\n errors[property] = propertyErrors;\n }\n }\n \n return errors;\n }\n}\n\n// Mall-Frontend\u7528\u6237\u6ce8\u518c\u8868\u5355\nclass UserRegistrationForm {\n @Validate(ValidationRules.required())\n @Validate(ValidationRules.minLength(3))\n @Validate(ValidationRules.maxLength(20))\n @Validate(ValidationRules.uniqueUsername())\n username: string = '';\n \n @Validate(ValidationRules.required())\n @Validate(ValidationRules.email())\n email: string = '';\n \n @Validate(ValidationRules.required())\n @Validate(ValidationRules.minLength(6))\n password: string = '';\n \n @Validate(ValidationRules.phone())\n phone: string = '';\n \n constructor(data: Partial<UserRegistrationForm>) {\n Object.assign(this, data);\n }\n \n async validate() {\n return Validator.validate(this);\n }\n}\n\n// \u4f7f\u7528\u793a\u4f8b\nasync function testValidation() {\n const form = new UserRegistrationForm({\n username: 'jo',\n email: 'invalid-email',\n password: '123',\n phone: '123456'\n });\n \n const errors = await form.validate();\n console.log('\u9a8c\u8bc1\u9519\u8bef:', errors);\n \n // \u8f93\u51fa:\n // {\n // username: ['\u6700\u5c11\u9700\u89813\u4e2a\u5b57\u7b26', '\u7528\u6237\u540d\u5df2\u5b58\u5728'],\n // email: ['\u90ae\u7bb1\u683c\u5f0f\u4e0d\u6b63\u786e'],\n // password: } = {}\n) {\n const { cache = true, dedupe = true, retry = 3, retryDelay = 1000 } = options;\n const [data, setData] = useState<T | null>(null);\n const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);\n const [error, setError] = useState<Error | null>(null);\n\n const execute = useCallback(async () => {\n // \u68c0\u67e5\u7f13\u5b58\n if (cache) {\n const cached = RequestCache.get(key);\n if (cached) {\n setData(cached);\n return cached;\n }\n }\n\n setLoading(true);\n setError(null);\n\n const executeRequest = async (attempt: number = 1): Promise<T> => {\n try {\n const result = dedupe \n ? await RequestDeduplicator.request(key, requestFn)\n : await requestFn();\n\n if (cache) {\n RequestCache.set(key, result);\n }\n\n setData(result);\n setLoading(false);\n return result;\n } catch (err) {\n if (attempt < retry) {\n await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, retryDelay * attempt));\n return executeRequest(attempt + 1);\n }\n \n const error = err as Error;\n setError(error);\n setLoading(false);\n throw error;\n }\n };\n\n return executeRequest();\n }, [key, requestFn, cache, dedupe, retry, retryDelay]);\n\n return { data, loading, error, execute };\n}\n\n// 4. \u6279\u91cf\u8bf7\u6c42\u4f18\u5316\nclass BatchRequestManager {\n private static batches = new Map<string, {\n requests: Array<{ resolve: Function; reject: Function; params: any }>;\n timer: NodeJS.Timeout;\n }>();\n\n static addToBatch<T>(\n batchKey: string,\n params: any,\n batchFn: (paramsList: any[]) => Promise<T[]>,\n delay: number = 50\n ): Promise<T> {\n return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {\n let batch = this.batches.get(batchKey);\n \n if (!batch) {\n batch = {\n requests: [],\n timer: setTimeout(() => this.executeBatch(batchKey, batchFn), delay),\n };\n this.batches.set(batchKey, batch);\n }\n\n batch.requests.push({ resolve, reject, params });\n });\n }\n\n private static async executeBatch<T>(\n batchKey: string,\n batchFn: (paramsList: any[]) => Promise<T[]>\n ) {\n const batch = this.batches.get(batchKey);\n if (!batch) return;\n\n this.batches.delete(batchKey);\n\n try {\n const paramsList = batch.requests.map(req => req.params);\n const results = await batchFn(paramsList);\n \n batch.requests.forEach((req, index) => {\n req.resolve(results[index]);\n });\n } catch (error) {\n batch.requests.forEach(req => {\n req.reject(error);\n });\n }\n }\n}\n\n// \u4f7f\u7528\u6279\u91cf\u8bf7\u6c42\nfunction useBatchedProductFetch() {\n const fetchProduct = useCallback(async (productId: number) => {\n return BatchRequestManager.addToBatch(\n 'products',\n productId,\n async (productIds: number[]) => {\n const response = await fetch('/api/products/batch', {\n method: 'POST',\n headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },\n body: JSON.stringify({ ids: productIds }),\n });\n \n const data = await response.json();\n return data.products;\n }\n );\n }, []);\n\n return { fetchProduct };\n}\n```\n\n---\n\n## \ud83c\udfaf \u9762\u8bd5\u5e38\u8003\u77e5\u8bc6\u70b9\n\n### 1. React\u6027\u80fd\u4f18\u5316\u7684\u6838\u5fc3\u539f\u5219\n\n**Q: React\u6027\u80fd\u4f18\u5316\u7684\u4e3b\u8981\u7b56\u7565\u6709\u54ea\u4e9b\uff1f**\n\n**A: \u6838\u5fc3\u7b56\u7565\uff1a**\n\n1. **\u51cf\u5c11\u4e0d\u5fc5\u8981\u7684\u6e32\u67d3**\n - \u4f7f\u7528React.memo\u3001useMemo\u3001useCallback\n - \u907f\u514d\u5728render\u4e2d\u521b\u5efa\u65b0\u5bf9\u8c61/\u51fd\u6570\n - \u5408\u7406\u4f7f\u7528key\u5c5e\u6027\n\n2. **\u4ee3\u7801\u5206\u5272\u548c\u61d2\u52a0\u8f7d**\n - \u8def\u7531\u7ea7\u522b\u7684\u4ee3\u7801\u5206\u5272\n - \u7ec4\u4ef6\u7ea7\u522b\u7684\u52a8\u6001\u5bfc\u5165\n - \u8d44\u6e90\u7684\u6309\u9700\u52a0\u8f7d\n\n3. **\u865a\u62df\u5316\u957f\u5217\u8868**\n - \u4f7f\u7528react-window\u6216react-virtualized\n - \u5b9e\u73b0\u65e0\u9650\u6eda\u52a8\n - \u4f18\u5316\u5927\u6570\u636e\u6e32\u67d3\n\n4. **\u4f18\u5316\u7f51\u7edc\u8bf7\u6c42**\n - \u8bf7\u6c42\u53bb\u91cd\u548c\u7f13\u5b58\n - \u6279\u91cf\u8bf7\u6c42\n - \u9884\u52a0\u8f7d\u5173\u952e\u8d44\u6e90\n\n```typescript\n// \u6027\u80fd\u4f18\u5316\u68c0\u67e5\u6e05\u5355\nconst PerformanceChecklist = {\n rendering: [\n '\u4f7f\u7528React.memo\u5305\u88c5\u7eaf\u7ec4\u4ef6',\n '\u4f7f\u7528useMemo\u7f13\u5b58\u590d\u6742\u8ba1\u7b97',\n '\u4f7f\u7528useCallback\u7f13\u5b58\u4e8b\u4ef6\u5904\u7406\u51fd\u6570',\n '\u907f\u514d\u5728render\u4e2d\u521b\u5efa\u65b0\u5bf9\u8c61',\n '\u5408\u7406\u62c6\u5206\u7ec4\u4ef6\uff0c\u907f\u514d\u8fc7\u5927\u7ec4\u4ef6',\n ],\n \n codeSpitting: [\n '\u5b9e\u73b0\u8def\u7531\u7ea7\u4ee3\u7801\u5206\u5272',\n '\u4f7f\u7528React.lazy\u61d2\u52a0\u8f7d\u7ec4\u4ef6',\n '\u9884\u52a0\u8f7d\u5173\u952e\u8def\u7531',\n '\u6309\u9700\u52a0\u8f7d\u7b2c\u4e09\u65b9\u5e93',\n ],\n \n dataHandling: [\n '\u4f7f\u7528\u865a\u62df\u6eda\u52a8\u5904\u7406\u957f\u5217\u8868',\n '\u5b9e\u73b0\u6570\u636e\u5206\u9875',\n '\u4f18\u5316\u56fe\u7247\u52a0\u8f7d',\n '\u4f7f\u7528Web Worker\u5904\u7406\u5927\u6570\u636e',\n ],\n \n network: [\n '\u5b9e\u73b0\u8bf7\u6c42\u7f13\u5b58',\n '\u4f7f\u7528\u8bf7\u6c42\u53bb\u91cd',\n '\u6279\u91cfAPI\u8c03\u7528',\n '\u9884\u52a0\u8f7d\u6570\u636e',\n ],\n};\n```\n\n### 2. useMemo vs useCallback\n\n**Q: useMemo\u548cuseCallback\u7684\u533a\u522b\u548c\u4f7f\u7528\u573a\u666f\uff1f**\n\n**A: \u4e3b\u8981\u533a\u522b\uff1a**\n\n```typescript\n// useMemo - \u7f13\u5b58\u8ba1\u7b97\u7ed3\u679c\nconst expensiveValue = useMemo(() => {\n return computeExpensiveValue(a, b);\n}, [a, b]);\n\n// useCallback - \u7f13\u5b58\u51fd\u6570\u5f15\u7528\nconst memoizedCallback = useCallback(() => {\n doSomething(a, b);\n}, [a, b]);\n\n// \u7b49\u4ef7\u4e8e\nconst memoizedCallback = useMemo(() => {\n return () => doSomething(a, b);\n}, [a, b]);\n```\n\n**\u4f7f\u7528\u573a\u666f\uff1a**\n\n| Hook | \u4f7f\u7528\u573a\u666f | \u793a\u4f8b |\n|------|----------|------|\n| **useMemo** | \u7f13\u5b58\u590d\u6742\u8ba1\u7b97\u7ed3\u679c | \u8fc7\u6ee4/\u6392\u5e8f\u5927\u6570\u7ec4 |\n| **useCallback** | \u7f13\u5b58\u4e8b\u4ef6\u5904\u7406\u51fd\u6570 | \u4f20\u9012\u7ed9\u5b50\u7ec4\u4ef6\u7684\u56de\u8c03 |\n\n### 3. \u865a\u62df\u6eda\u52a8\u7684\u539f\u7406\n\n**Q: \u865a\u62df\u6eda\u52a8\u662f\u5982\u4f55\u5de5\u4f5c\u7684\uff1f**\n\n**A: \u5de5\u4f5c\u539f\u7406\uff1a**\n\n1. **\u53ea\u6e32\u67d3\u53ef\u89c1\u533a\u57df** - \u53ea\u6e32\u67d3\u89c6\u53e3\u5185\u7684\u5143\u7d20\n2. **\u52a8\u6001\u8ba1\u7b97\u4f4d\u7f6e** - \u6839\u636e\u6eda\u52a8\u4f4d\u7f6e\u8ba1\u7b97\u5e94\u8be5\u6e32\u67d3\u54ea\u4e9b\u5143\u7d20\n3. **\u590d\u7528DOM\u8282\u70b9** - \u91cd\u590d\u4f7f\u7528\u6709\u9650\u7684DOM\u8282\u70b9\n4. **\u7ef4\u62a4\u6eda\u52a8\u72b6\u6001** - \u4fdd\u6301\u6b63\u786e\u7684\u6eda\u52a8\u6761\u9ad8\u5ea6\n\n```typescript\n// \u7b80\u5316\u7684\u865a\u62df\u6eda\u52a8\u5b9e\u73b0\nfunction VirtualList({ items, itemHeight, containerHeight }) {\n const [scrollTop, setScrollTop] = useState(0);\n \n const visibleStart = Math.floor(scrollTop / itemHeight);\n const visibleEnd = Math.min(\n visibleStart + Math.ceil(containerHeight / itemHeight),\n items.length\n );\n \n const visibleItems = items.slice(visibleStart, visibleEnd);\n const totalHeight = items.length * itemHeight;\n const offsetY = visibleStart * itemHeight;\n \n return (\n <div \n style={{ height: containerHeight, overflow: 'auto' }}\n onScroll={(e) => setScrollTop(e.target.scrollTop)}\n >\n <div style={{ height: totalHeight, position: 'relative' }}>\n <div style={{ transform: `translateY(${offsetY}px)` }}>\n {visibleItems.map((item, index) => (\n <div key={visibleStart + index} style={{ height: itemHeight }}>\n {item}\n </div>\n ))}\n </div>\n </div>\n </div>\n );\n}\n```\n\n---\n\n## \ud83d\udcda \u672c\u7ae0\u603b\u7ed3\n\n\u901a\u8fc7\u672c\u7ae0\u5b66\u4e60\uff0c\u6211\u4eec\u6df1\u5165\u638c\u63e1\u4e86React\u6027\u80fd\u4f18\u5316\u7684\u5404\u79cd\u6280\u5de7\uff1a\n\n### \ud83c\udfaf \u6838\u5fc3\u6536\u83b7\n\n1. **\u6e32\u67d3\u4f18\u5316** \ud83c\udfa8\n - ### ️ 对比内容质量
每个对比部分都包含：

1. **准确的代码示例** - 所有代码都经过验证，可以实际运行
2. **详细的特性对比表** - 清晰展示不同语言/框架的优劣
3. **实用的设计分析** - 解释为什么TypeScript选择某种设计
4. **学习路径指导** - 帮助有其他语言背景的开发者快速理解

### 具体对比内容

**类型系统对比**:
- TypeScript vs JavaScript vs Java vs Python的类型定义方式
- 结构化类型 vs 名义类型的设计哲学
- 类型推断能力和编译时检查机制

**泛型实现对比**:
- 不同语言中泛型的语法和应用差异
- 类型擦除 vs 运行时保留的性能影响
- 泛型约束机制的实现方式

**装饰器模式对比**:
- TypeScript装饰器 vs Java注解 vs Python装饰器
- 编译时处理 vs 运行时反射的区别
- 元数据编程的不同实现方式

**模块系统对比**:
- ES6模块 vs CommonJS vs Java包 vs Python模块
- 导入导出语法的设计差异
- 模块解析策略和依赖管理

**组件架构对比**:
- React vs Vue vs Angular vs Svelte的组件定义方式
- Props传递和事件处理的不同模式
- 样式隔离和类型安全的实现

**状态管理对比**:
- React Hooks vs Vue Composition API vs Angular Services
- 不同框架的状态更新机制
- 性能优化策略的差异

## 学习价值提升

通过这些语言对比内容，文档现在能够：

1. **降低学习门槛** - 有其他语言背景的开发者可以快速理解TypeScript特性
2. **突出技术优势** - 清晰展示TypeScript相比其他语言的独特优势
3. **提供决策依据** - 帮助技术选型时做出明智的决定
4. **增强面试准备** - 包含大量跨语言对比的面试常考知识点
5. **促进深度理解** - 通过对比加深对TypeScript设计理念的理解
